 14226                                  
 14227                                  ;Break	<LRUFCB - perform LRU on FCB sfts>
 14228                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14229                                  ;
 14230                                  ;   LRUFCB - find LRU fcb in cache. Set ThisSFT and return it. We preserve
 14231                                  ;	the first keepcount sfts if they are network sfts or if sharing is
 14232                                  ;	loaded.  If carry is set then NO BLASTING is NECESSARY.
 14233                                  ;
 14234                                  ;   Inputs:	none
 14235                                  ;   Outputs:	ES:DI point to SFT

 14237                                  ;		SFT is zeroed
 14238                                  ;		Carry set of closes failed
 14239                                  ;   Registers modified: none

 14242                                  ;
 14243                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 14244                                  ;IF 0	; rewritten this routine
 14245                                  ;
 14246                                  ;LRUFCB: ; MSDOS 3.3 - IBMDOS.COM (1987) - Offset 25ADh
 14247                                  ;	call	save_world

 14249                                  ; Find nth oldest NET/SHARE FCB. We want to find its age for the second scan
 14250                                  ; to find the lease recently used one that is younger than the open age.  We
 14251                                  ; operate be scanning the list n times finding the least age that is greater
 14252                                  ; or equal to the previous minimum age.
 14253                                  ;

 14255                                  ;   AX is the current acceptable minimum age to consider

 14271                                  ;   SI is the position of the entry that corresponds to BX
 14272                                  ;

 14279                                  ;	LEA	DI,[DI+SFT.SFTable]

 14282                                  ; current entry is busy (indicating a previous aborted allocation), then we

 14298                                  ;	JMP	short lru11		;	      goto got;

 14324                                  ;	CMP	DX,BX
 14325                                  ;	JAE	short lru5		;	      age[i] < min) {

 14430                                  ;	;CMP	word [ES:DI+SFT.sf_ref_count],0 ; is ref count still <> 0?
 14431                                  ;	JZ	short LRUDone 		; nope, all done
 14432                                  ;	call	DOS_CLOSE
 14433                                  ;	jnc	short LRUClose		; no error => clean up
 14434                                  ;	;cmp	al,6
 14435                                  ;	cmp	al,error_invalid_handle
 14436                                  ;	jz	short LRUClose
 14437                                  ;	stc
 14438                                  ;	JMP	short LRUDead
 14439                                  ;LRUDone:
 14440                                  ;	XOR	AL,AL
 14441                                  ;	call	BlastSFT		; fill SFT with 0 (AL), 'C' cleared
 14442                                  ;
 14443                                  ;LRUDead:
 14444                                  ;	call	restore_world
 14445                                  ;	LES     DI,[CS:THISSFT]
 14446                                  ;	jnc	short LRUFCB_retn
 14447                                  ;LRUFCB_err:
 14448                                  ;	; mov	al, 23h	
 14449                                  ;	MOV	AL,error_FCB_unavailable
 14450                                  ;LRUFCB_retn:	
 14451                                  ;	retn:
 14452                                  ;
 14453                                  ;ENDIF	; LRUFCB has been rewritten below.
 14454                                  
 14455                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14456                                  ; LRUFCB for MSDOS 6.0 !
 14457                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14458                                  ;
 14459                                  ; LruFCB -- allocate the LRU SFT from the SFT Table. The LRU scheme
 14460                                  ; maintains separate counts for net/Share and local SFTs. We allocate a 
 14461                                  ; net/Share SFT only if we do not find a local SFT. This helps keep
 14462                                  ; net/Share SFTs which cannot be regenerated for as long as possible. We
 14463                                  ; optimize regeneration operations by keeping track of the current local
 14464                                  ; SFT. This avoids scanning of the SFTs as long as we have at least one 
 14465                                  ; local SFT in the SFT Block.
 14466                                  ;
 14467                                  ; Inputs: al = 0 => Regenerate SFT operation
 14468                                  ;	    = 1 => Allocate new SFT for Open/Create
 14469                                  ;
 14470                                  ; Outputs: Carry clear
 14471                                  ;	 	es:di = Address of allocated SFT
 14472                                  ;	  	ThisSFT = Address of allocated SFT
 14473                                  ;
 14474                                  ;	  carry set if closes of net/Share files failed 
 14475                                  ;		al = error_FCB_unavailable
 14476                                  ;
 14477                                  ; Registers affected: None
 14478                                  ;
 14479                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14480                                  
 14481                                  ;LruFCB	PROC	NEAR
 14482                                  LRUFCB:
 14483                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14484                                  	; DOSCODE:5805h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 14485                                  
 14486                                  	; 08/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14487                                  	; DOSCODE:57F1h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 14488                                  
 14489                                  	; 20/01/2024 Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMMDOS.COM)
 14490                                  	; DOSCODE:5E7Ch (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 14491                                  
 14492 00001EEC 06                      	push	es	; * (MSDOS 6.21)
 14493                                  	
 14494 00001EED E87CE5                  	call	save_world
 14495                                  	
 14496                                  	;getdseg <ds>		;ds = DOSDATA
 14497 00001EF0 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 14498                                  
 14499 00001EF5 08C0                    	or	al,al		;Check if regenerate allocation
 14500 00001EF7 7516                    	jnz	short lru1	;Try to find SFT to use
 14501                                  
 14502                                  	; This is a regen call. If LocalSFT contains the address of a valid 
 14503                                  	; local SFT, just return that SFT to reuse
 14504                                  
 14505                                  	; 20/01/2024
 14506                                  	;mov	di,[LocalSFT]
 14507                                  	;or	di,[LocalSFT+2]	;is address == 0?
 14508                                  	;jz	short lru1	;invalid local SFT, find one
 14509                                  
 14510                                  	; We have found a valid local SFT. Recycle this SFT
 14511                                  
 14512 00001EF9 C43E[470F]              	les	di,[LocalSFT]
 14513                                  
 14514                                  	; 20/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 14515 00001EFD 8CC1                    	mov	cx,es
 14516 00001EFF 09F9                    	or	cx,di		; is address == 0?
 14517 00001F01 740C                    	jz	short lru1	; invalid local SFT, find one
 14518                                  
 14519                                  gotlocalSFT:
 14520 00001F03 893E[9E05]              	mov	[THISSFT],di
 14521 00001F07 8C06[A005]              	mov	[THISSFT+2],es
 14522 00001F0B F8                      	clc
 14523 00001F0C E9A900                  	jmp	LRUDone		;clear up SFT and return
 14524                                  
 14525                                  lru1:
 14526 00001F0F C43E[4000]              	les	di,[SFTFCB]	;es:di = SF Table for FCBs
 14527                                  	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 14528 00001F13 268B4D04                	mov	cx,[es:di+SFT.SFCount]	;cx = number of SFTs
 14529                                  	;lea	di,[di+6]
 14530 00001F17 8D7D06                  	lea	di,[di+SFT.SFTable]	;es:di = first SFT
 14531                                  
 14532                                  	; We scan through all the SFTs scanning for a free one. It also 
 14533                                  	; remembers the LRU SFT for net/Share SFTs and local SFTs separately. 
 14534                                  	; bx = min. LRU for local SFTs
 14535                                  	; si = pos. of local SFT with min. LRU
 14536                                  	; dx = min. LRU for net/Share SFTs
 14537                                  	; bp = pos. of net/Share SFT with min. LRU
 14538                                  
 14539 00001F1A BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,-1		; init. to 0xffff ( max. LRU value )
 14540 00001F1D 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 14541 00001F1F 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 14542 00001F21 89DD                    	mov	bp,bx
 14543                                  
 14544                                  findSFT:
 14545                                  	;See if this SFT is a free one. If so, return it
 14546 00001F23 26830D00                	or	word [es:di],0
 14547                                  	;or	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0 ;reference count = 0 ?
 14548 00001F27 744C                    	jz	short gotSFT	;yes, SFT is free
 14549                                  	;;cmp	word [es:di],-1
 14550                                  	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],sf_busy ;Is it busy?
 14551 00001F29 26833DFF                	cmp	word [es:di],sf_busy ; -1 
 14552 00001F2D 7446                    	jz	short gotSFT	;no, can use it
 14553                                  
 14554                                  	; Check if this SFT is local and store its address in LocalSFT. Can be 
 14555                                  	; used for a later regen.
 14556                                  
 14557                                  	; 16/12/2022
 14558                                  	; 08/11/2022
 14559                                  	;test	byte [es:di+6],80h
 14560 00001F2F 26F6450680              	test	byte [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags+1],(sf_isnet>>8) ; 80h
 14561                                  	; 08/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 14562                                  	;;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 14563                                  	;test	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet ; network SFT?
 14564 00001F34 7531                    	jnz	short lru5	;yes, get net/Share LRU
 14565                                  
 14566                                  ;IF installed
 14567 00001F36 E84061                  	call	CheckShare	;Share present?
 14568                                  ;ENDIF
 14569 00001F39 752C                    	jnz	short lru5	;yes, get net/Share LRU
 14570                                  
 14571                                  	;Local SFT, register its address
 14572                                  
 14573                                  	; !!HACK!!!
 14574                                  	; There is a slightly dirty hack out here in a desperate bid to save  
 14575                                  	; code space. There is similar code duplicated at label 'gotSFT'. We 
 14576                                  	; enter from there if al = 0, update the LocalSFT variable, and since 
 14577                                  	; al = 0, we jump out of the loop to the exit point. I have commented 
 14578                                  	; out the code that previously existed at label 'gotSFT'
 14579                                  
 14580                                  hackpoint:
 14581 00001F3B 893E[470F]              	mov	[LocalSFT],di
 14582 00001F3F 8C06[490F]              	mov	[LocalSFT+2],es	;store local SFT address
 14583                                  
 14584 00001F43 08C0                    	or	al,al		;Is operation = REGEN?
 14585 00001F45 74BC                    	jz	short gotlocalSFT ;yes, return this SFT for reuse
 14586                                  
 14587                                  	;Get LRU for local files
 14588                                  	
 14589                                  	;cmp	[es:di+15h],bx
 14590 00001F47 26395D15                	cmp	[es:di+sf_LRU],bx ;SFT.LRU < min?
 14591 00001F4B 7306                    	jae	short lru4	;no, skip 
 14592                                  
 14593                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+15h]
 14594 00001F4D 268B5D15                	mov	bx,[es:di+sf_LRU] ;yes, store new minimum
 14595 00001F51 89FE                    	mov	si,di		;store SFT position
 14596                                  lru4:
 14597                                  	;add	di,59
 14598 00001F53 83C73B                  	add	di,SF_ENTRY.size ;go to next SFT
 14599 00001F56 E2CB                    	loop	findSFT
 14600                                  	
 14601                                  	; 20/01/2024
 14602 00001F58 49                      	dec	cx ; -1
 14603                                  
 14604                                  	; Check whether we got a net/Share or local SFT. If local SFT
 14605                                  	; available, we will reuse it instead of net/Share LRU
 14606                                  
 14607 00001F59 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 14608                                  	;cmp	si,-1		;local SFT available?
 14609 00001F5B 39CE                    	cmp	si,cx ; 20/01/2024
 14610 00001F5D 7516                    	jnz	short gotSFT	;yes, return it
 14611                                  
 14612                                  	;No local SFT, see if we got a net/Share SFT
 14613                                  
 14614 00001F5F 89EF                    	mov	di,bp
 14615                                  
 14616 00001F61 39CD                    	cmp	bp,cx ; -1 ; 20/01/2024
 14617                                  	;cmp	bp,-1		;net/Share SFT available?
 14618 00001F63 752D                    	jnz	short gotnetSFT	;yes, return it
 14619                                  noSFT:
 14620                                  	; NB: This error should never occur. We always must have an LRU SFT.
 14621                                  	; This error can occur only if the SFT has been corrupted or the LRU
 14622                                  	; count is not maintained properly.
 14623                                  
 14624 00001F65 EB4E                    	jmp	short errorbadSFT ;error, no FCB available.
 14625                                  
 14626                                  	; Handle the LRU for net/Share SFTs
 14627                                  lru5:
 14628                                  	;cmp	[es:di+15h],dx
 14629 00001F67 26395515                	cmp	[es:di+sf_LRU],dx ;SFT.LRU < min?
 14630 00001F6B 73E6                    	jae	short lru4	;no, skip
 14631                                  
 14632                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+15h]
 14633 00001F6D 268B5515                	mov	dx,[es:di+sf_LRU] ;yes, store new minimum
 14634                                  
 14635 00001F71 89FD                    	mov	bp,di		;store SFT position
 14636 00001F73 EBDE                    	jmp	short lru4	;continue with next SFT
 14637                                  
 14638                                  gotSFT:
 14639 00001F75 08C0                    	or	al,al
 14640 00001F77 74C2                    	jz	short hackpoint	;save es:di in LocalSFT
 14641                                  
 14642                                  	; HACK!!!
 14643                                  	; The code here differs from the code at 'hackpoint' only in the 
 14644                                  	; order of the check for al. If al = 0, we can jump to 'hackpoint'
 14645                                  	; and then from there jump out to 'gotlocalSFT'. The original code
 14646                                  	; has been commented out below and replaced by the code just above.
 14647                                  
 14648                                  ;If regen, then this SFT can be registered as a local one ( even if free ).
 14649                                  ;
 14650                                  ;	or	al,al		  ;Regen?
 14651                                  ;	jnz	short notlocaluse ;yes, register it and return
 14652                                  ;
 14653                                  ;Register this SFT as a local one
 14654                                  ;
 14655                                  ;	mov	[LocalSFT],di
 14656                                  ;	mov	[LocalSFT+2],es
 14657                                  ;	jmp	gotlocalSFT	;return to caller
 14658                                  ;
 14659                                  ;notlocaluse:
 14660                                  
 14661                                  	; The caller is probably going to use this SFT for a net/Share file.
 14662                                  	; We will come here only on a Open/Create when the caller($FCB_OPEN)
 14663                                  	; does not really know whether it is a local file or not. We
 14664                                  	; invalidate LocalSFT if the SFT we are going to use was previously
 14665                                  	; registered as a local SFT that can be recycled.
 14666                                  
 14667 00001F79 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 14668 00001F7B 393E[470F]              	cmp	[LocalSFT],di		;Offset same?
 14669 00001F7F 750E                    	jne	short notinvalid
 14670 00001F81 3906[490F]              	cmp	[LocalSFT+2],ax		;Segments same?
 14671                                  	;je	short zerolocalSFT	;no, no need to invalidate
 14672                                  	; 20/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 14673 00001F85 7508                    	jne	short notinvalid
 14674                                  zerolocalSFT:	
 14675 00001F87 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 14676 00001F89 A3[470F]                	mov	[LocalSFT],ax
 14677 00001F8C A3[490F]                	mov	[LocalSFT+2],ax
 14678                                  	
 14679                                  notinvalid:
 14680 00001F8F E971FF                  	jmp	gotlocalSFT
 14681                                  
 14682                                  	; The SFT we are going to use was registered in the LocalSFT variable.
 14683                                  	; Invalidate this variable i.e LocalSFT = NULL
 14684                                  
 14685                                  ;zerolocalSFT:
 14686                                  	;xor	ax,ax ; 0
 14687                                  	;mov	[LocalSFT],ax
 14688                                  	;mov	[LocalSFT+2],ax
 14689                                  	;
 14690                                  	;jmp	gotlocalSFT
 14691                                  
 14692                                  gotnetSFT:
 14693                                  	; We have an SFT that is currently net/Share. If it is going to be
 14694                                  	; used for a regen, we know it has to be a local SFT. Update the
 14695                                  	; LocalSFT variable
 14696                                  
 14697 00001F92 08C0                    	or	al,al
 14698 00001F94 7508                    	jnz	short closenet
 14699                                  
 14700 00001F96 893E[470F]              	mov	[LocalSFT],di
 14701 00001F9A 8C06[490F]              	mov	[LocalSFT+2],es	;store local SFT address
 14702                                  closenet:
 14703 00001F9E 893E[9E05]              	mov	[THISSFT],di	; set thissft
 14704 00001FA2 8C06[A005]              	mov	[THISSFT+2],es	
 14705                                  
 14706                                  	; If we have sharing or thisSFT is a net sft, then close it until ref
 14707                                  	; count is 0.
 14708                                  	; NB: We come here only if it is a net/Share SFT that is going to be
 14709                                  	; recycled -- no need to check for this.
 14710                                  
 14711                                  LRUClose:
 14712 00001FA6 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0
 14713                                  	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0 ; is ref count still <> 0?
 14714 00001FAA 740C                    	jz	short LRUDone	; nope, all done
 14715                                  
 14716 00001FAC E86416                  	call	DOS_CLOSE
 14717 00001FAF 73F5                    	jnc	short LRUClose	; no error => clean up
 14718                                  
 14719                                  	; Bugbug: I dont know why we are trying to close after we get an
 14720                                  	; error closing. Seems like we could have a potential infinite loop
 14721                                  	; here. This has to be verified.
 14722                                  
 14723 00001FB1 3C06                    	cmp	al,error_invalid_handle ; 6
 14724 00001FB3 74F1                    	je	short LRUClose
 14725                                  errorbadSFT:
 14726 00001FB5 F9                      	stc
 14727 00001FB6 EB05                    	JMP	short LRUDead
 14728                                  LRUDone:
 14729 00001FB8 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL
 14730 00001FBA E81101                  	call	BlastSFT		; fill SFT with 0 (AL), 'C' cleared
 14731                                  
 14732                                  LRUDead:
 14733 00001FBD E895E4                  	call	restore_world		; use macro
 14734                                  	
 14735 00001FC0 07                      	pop	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21)
 14736                                  
 14737                                  	;getdseg <es>
 14738 00001FC1 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 14739 00001FC6 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]		;es:di points at allocated SFT
 14740                                  
 14741                                  	;;retnc
 14742                                  	;jc	short LruFCB_err
 14743                                  	;retn
 14744                                  
 14745                                  	; 16/12/2022
 14746                                  	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 14747 00001FCB 7302                    	jnc	short LruFCB_retn
 14748                                  	;jc	short LruFCB_err
 14749                                  	;retn
 14750                                  		
 14751                                  LruFCB_err:
 14752 00001FCD B023                    	MOV	AL,error_FCB_unavailable ; 23h
 14753                                  LruFCB_retn:
 14754 00001FCF C3                      	retn
 14755                                  	
 14756                                  ;LruFCB	ENDP

 14759

 14762                                  ; 26/06/2024
 14763                                  %if 0
 14764                                  
 14765                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14766                                  ;**** RegenCopyName -- This function copies the filename from the FCB to
 14767                                  ; SFT and also to DOS local buffers. There was duplicate code in FCBRegen
 14768                                  ; to copy the name to different destinations
 14769                                  ;
 14770                                  ; Inputs: ds:si = source string
 14771                                  ;	 es:di = destination string
 14772                                  ;	 cx = length of string
 14773                                  ;
 14774                                  ; Outputs: String copied to destination
 14775                                  ;
 14776                                  ; Registers affected: cx,di,si
 14777                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14778                                  
 14779                                  RegenCopyName:
 14780                                  CopyName:
 14781                                  	lodsb			;load character
 14782                                  	call	UCase		; convert char to upper case
 14783                                  StuffChar2:
 14784                                  	STOSB			;store converted character
 14785                                  	LOOP	CopyName	;
 14786                                  DoneName:
 14787                                  	retn
 14788

 14791                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14792                                  
 14793                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14794                                  	; 21/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 14795                                  
 14796                                  FCBRegen:
 14797                                  	; called from SFTFromFCB. SS already DOSDATA
 14798                                  
 14799                                  	; General data filling. Mode is sf_isFCB + open_for_both, date/time 
 14800                                  	; we do not fill, size we do no fill, position we do not fill,
 14801                                  	; bit 14 of flags = TRUE, other bits = FALSE
 14802                                  
 14803                                  	;mov	al,[si+19h]
 14804 00001FD0 8A4419                  	MOV	AL,[SI+fcb_l_drive]
 14805                                  
 14806                                  	; We discriminate based on the first two bits in the reserved field.
 14807                                  	
 14808                                  	;test	al,80h
 14809 00001FD3 A880                    	test	AL,FCBSPECIAL		; check for no sharing test
 14810 00001FD5 741C                    	JZ	short RegenNoSharing	; yes, go regen from no sharing
 14811                                  
 14812                                  	; The FCB is for a network or a sharing based system. At this point 
 14813                                  	; we have already closed the SFT for this guy and reconnection is 
 14814                                  	; impossible.
 14815                                  	;
 14816                                  	; Remember that he may have given us a FCB with bogus information in
 14817                                  	; it. Check to see if sharing is present or if the redir is present.
 14818                                  	; If either is around, presume that we have cycled out the FCB and 
 14819                                  	; give the hard error. Otherwise, just return with carry set.
 14820                                  
 14821 00001FD7 E89F60                  	call	CheckShare		; test for sharer
 14822 00001FDA 7509                    	JNZ	short RegenFail		; yep, fail this.
 14823                                  	
 14824                                  	;mov	ax,1100h
 14825 00001FDC B80011                  	MOV	AX,MultNET<<8		; install check on multnet
 14826 00001FDF CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - INSTALLATION CHECK
 14827                                  			; Return: AL = 00h  not installed, OK to install
 14828                                  			; 01h  not installed, not OK to install
 14829                                  			; FFh  installed
 14830 00001FE1 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL			; is it there?
 14831 00001FE3 740C                    	JZ	short RegenDead		; no, just fail the operation
 14832                                  RegenFail:
 14833                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14834                                  	;MOV	AX,[CS:USER_IN_AX]	; SS override
 14835 00001FE5 36A1[3A03]              	mov	ax,[SS:USER_IN_AX] ; MSDOS 6.0
 14836                                  
 14837                                  	;cmp	ah,10h
 14838 00001FE9 80FC10                  	cmp	AH,FCB_CLOSE
 14839 00001FEC 7403                    	jz	short RegenDead
 14840 00001FEE E89801                  	call	FCBHardErr		; massive hard error.
 14841                                  RegenDead:
 14842 00001FF1 F9                      	STC				; carry set
 14843                                  FCBRegen_retn:
 14844 00001FF2 C3                      	retn
 14845                                  
 14846                                  	; Local FCB without sharing. Check to see if sharing is loaded. If 
 14847                                  	; so fail the operation.
 14848                                  
 14849                                  RegenNoSharing:
 14850 00001FF3 E88360                  	call	CheckShare		; Sharing around?
 14851 00001FF6 75ED                    	JNZ	short RegenFail
 14852                                  	
 14853                                  	; Find an SFT for this guy.
 14854                                  	
 14855                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14856                                  
 14857                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 14858                                  	;call	LRUFCB
 14859                                  	;jc	short FCBRegen_retn
 14860                                  	
 14861                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 14862 00001FF8 50                      	push	ax
 14863 00001FF9 B000                    	mov	al,0			;indicate it is a regen operation
 14864 00001FFB E8EEFE                  	call	LRUFCB
 14865 00001FFE 58                      	pop	ax
 14866 00001FFF 72F1                    	jc	short FCBRegen_retn
 14867                                  
 14868                                  	;mov	word [es:di+2],8002h
 14869 00002001 26C745020280            	MOV	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB+open_for_both+SHARING_COMPAT
 14870 00002007 243F                    	AND	AL,3Fh			; get drive number for flags
 14871 00002009 98                      	CBW
 14872                                  	;or	ax,4000h
 14873 0000200A 0D0040                  	OR	AX,sf_close_nodate	; normal FCB operation
 14874                                  
 14875                                  	; The bits field consists of the upper two bits (dirty and device) 
 14876                                  	; from the SFT and the low 4 bits from the open mode.
 14877                                  
 14878                                  	;mov	cl,[si+1Ah]
 14879 0000200D 8A4C1A                  	MOV	CL,[SI+fcb_nsl_bits]	; stick in dirty bits.
 14880 00002010 88CD                    	MOV	CH,CL
 14881 00002012 80E5C0                  	AND	CH,0C0h 		; mask off the dirty/device bits
 14882 00002015 08E8                    	OR	AL,CH
 14883                                  	;and	cl,0Fh
 14884 00002017 80E10F                  	AND	CL,access_mask		; get the mode bits
 14885                                  	;mov	[es:di+2],cl
 14886 0000201A 26884D02                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],CL
 14887                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 14888 0000201E 26894505                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],AX ; initial flags
 14889                                  	;MOV	AX,[CS:PROC_ID]		; SS override
 14890 00002022 36A1[3C03]              	mov	ax,[ss:PROC_ID] ; MSDOS 6.0
 14891                                  	;mov	[es:di+31h],ax

 15101                                  ;**	BlastSFT - FIll SFT with Garbage
 15102                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15103                                  ;	BlastSFT is used when an SFT is no longer needed; it's called with
 15104                                  ;	various garbage values to put into the SFT.  I don't know why,
 15105                                  ;	presumably to help with debugging (jgl).  We clear the few fields
 15106                                  ;	necessary to show that the SFT is free after filling it.
 15107                                  ;
 15108                                  ;	ENTRY	(es:di) = address of SFT
 15109                                  ;		(al) = fill character
 15110                                  ;	EXIT	(ax) = -1
 15111                                  ;		'C' clear
 15112                                  ;	USES	AX, CX, Flags
 15113                                  
 15114                                  BlastSFT:
 15115                                  	; 21/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15116                                  	;;;
 15117 000020CE E88528                  	call	SFT_FREE
 15118                                  	;;;
 15119 000020D1 57                      	push	di
 15120                                  	;mov	cx,53 ; MSDOS 3.3
 15121                                  	;mov	cx,59 ; MSDOS 6.0
 15122 000020D2 B93B00                  	mov	cx,SF_ENTRY.size
 15123 000020D5 F3AA                    	rep	stosb
 15124 000020D7 5F                      	pop	di
 15125 000020D8 29C0                    	sub	ax,ax	; 0		; clear 'C'-----------------;
 15126 000020DA 268905                  	mov	[es:di],ax
 15127                                  	;mov	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],ax ; set ref count    ;
 15128                                  	;mov	[es:di+15h],ax
 15129 000020DD 26894515                	mov	[es:di+sf_LRU],ax	; set lru		    ;
 15130 000020E1 48                      	dec	ax	; -1					    ;
 15131                                  	;mov	[es:di+17h],ax ; 0FFFFh ; -1
 15132 000020E2 26894517                	mov	[es:di+sf_OpenAge],ax	; set open age to -1	    ;
 15133                                  BlastSFT_retn:
 15134 000020E6 C3                      	retn				; return with 'C' clear     ;

 15136                                  ;Break	<CheckFCB - see if the SFT pointed to by the FCB is still OK>
 15137                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15138                                  ;
 15139                                  ;   CheckFCB - examine an FCB and its contents to see if it needs to be
 15140                                  ;   regenerated.
 15141                                  ;
 15142                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB (not extended)
 15143                                  ;		AL is SFT index
 15144                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Set - FCB needs to be regened
 15145                                  ;		Carry clear - FCB is OK. ES:DI point to SFT
 15146                                  ;   Registers modified: AX and BX
 15147                                  ;
 15148                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15149                                  
 15150                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15151                                  	; DOSCODE:59F0h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 15152

 15364                                  ;
 15365                                  ;   SFTFromFCB - the workhorse of this compatability crap. Check to see if
 15366                                  ;	the SFT for the FCB is Good. If so, make ThisSFT point to it. If not
 15367                                  ;	good, get one from the cache and regenerate it. Overlay the LRU field
 15368                                  ;	with PID
 15369                                  ;
 15370                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB
 15371                                  ;   Outputs:	ThisSFT point to appropriate SFT
 15372                                  ;		Carry clear -> OK ES:DI -> SFT
 15373                                  ;		Carry set -> error in ax
 15374                                  ;   Registers modified: ES,DI, AX
 15375                                  ;
 15376                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15377                                  
 15378                                  SFTFromFCB:
 15379                                  	; called from fcbio and $fcb_close. SS already set up to DOSDATA
 15380                                  
 15381                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15382                                  
 15383 00002153 50                      	push	ax
 15384 00002154 53                      	push	bx
 15385                                  	;mov	al,[si+18h]
 15386 00002155 8A4418                  	MOV	AL,[SI+fcb_sfn] 	; set SFN for check
 15387 00002158 E88CFF                  	call	CheckFCB
 15388 0000215B 5B                      	pop	bx
 15389 0000215C 58                      	pop	ax
 15390                                  	;MOV	[CS:THISSFT],DI		; SS override
 15391                                  	;MOV	[CS:THISSFT+2],ES
 15392 0000215D 36893E[9E05]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT],DI		; SS override
 15393 00002162 368C06[A005]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT+2],ES
 15394 00002167 7311                    	JNC	short Set_SFT		; no problems, just set thissft
 15395                                  	
 15396                                  	; 09/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0)
 15397                                  	; 31/05/2019
 15398 00002169 06                      	push	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21) & (MSDOS 5.0)
 15399 0000216A E8FFE2                  	call	save_world
 15400 0000216D E860FE                  	call	FCBRegen
 15401 00002170 E8E2E2                  	call	restore_world		; use macro restore world
 15402 00002173 07                      	pop	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21) ; 31/05/2019 ; 09/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0)	
 15403                                  
 15404                                  	;MOV	AX,[CS:EXTERR]		; SS override
 15405 00002174 36A1[2403]              	MOV	AX,[SS:EXTERR]		; SS override
 15406 00002178 72C4                    	jc	short CheckNet_retn
 15407                                  
 15408                                  Set_SFT: 
 15409                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]		; SS override for THISSFT & PROC_ID
 15410 0000217A 36C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[ss:THISSFT]

 15412 0000217F 36FF36[3C03]            	push	word [ss:PROC_ID]
 15413                                  	;pop	word [es:di+31h]
 15414 00002184 268F4531                	POP     word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID]
 15415 00002188 C3                      	retn				; carry is clear

 15495                                  ;
 15496                                  ;		Created: ARR 4 April 1983
 15497                                  ;			 MZ  6 June  1983 completion of functions
 15498                                  ;			 MZ 15 Dec   1983 Brain damaged programs close FCBs multiple
 15499                                  ;				  times.  Change so successive closes work by
 15500                                  ;				  always returning OK.	Also, detect I/O to
 15501                                  ;				  already closed FCB and return EOF.
 15502                                  ;		 MZ 16 Jan   1984 More braindamage.  Need to separate info
 15503                                  ;				  out of sft into FCB for reconnection

 15507                                  ; Defintions for FCBOp flags
 15508                                  
 15509                                  RANDOM	equ 2				; random operation
 15510                                  FCBREAD equ 4				; doing a read
 15511                                  BLOCK	equ 8				; doing a block I/O
 15512                                  
 15513                                  ;Break <GetRR - return the random record field in DX:AX>
 15514                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15515                                  ;
 15516                                  ;   GetRR - correctly load DX:AX with the random record field (3 or 4 bytes)
 15517                                  ;	from the FCB pointed to by DS:SI
 15518                                  ;
 15519                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to an FCB
 15520                                  ;		BX has record size
 15521                                  ;   Outputs:	DX:AX contain the contents of the random record field
 15522                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 15523                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15524                                  
 15525                                  GetRR:
 15526                                  	;mov	ax,[si+21h]
 15527 000021C6 8B4421                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RR]	; get low order part
 15528                                  	;mov	dx,[si+23h]
 15529 000021C9 8B5423                  	MOV	DX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2]	; get high order part
 15530 000021CC 83FB40                  	CMP	BX,64			; ignore MSB of RR if recsiz > 64
 15531 000021CF 7202                    	JB	short GetRRBye
 15532                                  GetExtent_bye:	; 21/01/2024
 15533 000021D1 30F6                    	XOR	DH,DH
 15534                                  GetRRBye:
 15535 000021D3 C3                      	retn
 15536                                  
 15537                                  ;Break <GetExtent - retrieve next location for sequential IO>
 15538                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15539                                  ;
 15540                                  ;   GetExtent - Construct the next record to perform I/O from the EXTENT and
 15541                                  ;	NR fields in the FCB.
 15542                                  ;
 15543                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI - point to FCB
 15544                                  ;   Outputs:	DX:AX contain the contents of the random record field
 15545                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 15546                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15547                                  
 15548                                  GetExtent:
 15549                                  	;mov	al,[si+20h]
 15550 000021D4 8A4420                  	MOV	AL,[SI+SYS_FCB.NR]	; get low order piece
 15551                                  	;mov	dx,[si+0Ch]
 15552 000021D7 8B540C                  	MOV	DX,[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT]	; get high order piece
 15553 000021DA D0E0                    	SHL	AL,1
 15554 000021DC D1EA                    	SHR	DX,1
 15555 000021DE D0D8                    	RCR	AL,1	; move low order bit of DL to high order of AH
 15556 000021E0 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 15557 000021E2 88F2                    	MOV	DL,DH
 15558                                  	; 21/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15559                                  	;XOR	DH,DH
 15560                                  	;retn
 15561 000021E4 EBEB                    	jmp	short GetExtent_bye
 15562                                  
 15563                                  ;Break <SetExtent - update the extent/NR field>
 15564                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15565                                  ;
 15566                                  ;   SetExtent - change the position of an FCB by filling in the extent/NR
 15567                                  ;	fields
 15568                                  ;
 15569                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB
 15570                                  ;		DX:AX is a record location in file
 15571                                  ;   Outputs:	Extent/NR fields are filled in
 15572                                  ;   Registers modified: CX
 15573                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15574                                  
 15575                                  SetExtent:
 15576 000021E6 50                      	push	ax
 15577 000021E7 52                      	push	dx
 15578 000021E8 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX
 15579 000021EA 247F                    	AND	AL,7FH			; next rec field
 15580                                  	;mov	[si+20h],al
 15581 000021EC 884420                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.NR],AL
 15582 000021EF 80E180                  	AND	CL,80H			; save upper bit
 15583 000021F2 D1E1                    	SHL	CX,1
 15584 000021F4 D1D2                    	RCL	DX,1			; move high bit of CX to low bit of DX
 15585 000021F6 88E8                    	MOV	AL,CH
 15586 000021F8 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 15587                                  	;mov	[si+0Ch], ax
 15588 000021FA 89440C                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT],AX	; all done
 15589 000021FD 5A                      	pop	dx
 15590 000021FE 58                      	pop	ax
 15591 000021FF C3                      	retn
 15592                                  
 15593                                  ;Break <GetExtended - find FCB in potential extended fcb>
 15594                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15595                                  ;
 15596                                  ;   GetExtended - Make DS:SI point to FCB from DS:DX
 15597                                  ;
 15598                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a possible extended FCB
 15599                                  ;   Outputs:	DS:SI point to the FCB part
 15600                                  ;		zeroflag set if not extended fcb
 15601                                  ;   Registers modified: SI
 15602                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15603                                  
 15604                                  GetExtended:
 15605 00002200 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; point to Something
 15606 00002202 803CFF                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],-1		; look for extention
 15607 00002205 7503                    	JNZ	short GetBye		; not there
 15608 00002207 83C607                  	ADD	SI,7			; point to FCB
 15609                                  GetBye:
 15610 0000220A 39D6                    	CMP	SI,DX			; set condition codes
 15611                                  getextd_retn:
 15612 0000220C C3                      	retn
 15613                                  
 15614                                  ;Break <GetRecSize - return in BX the FCB record size>
 15615                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15616                                  ;
 15617                                  ;   GetRecSize - return in BX the record size from the FCB at DS:SI
 15618                                  ;
 15619                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to a non-extended FCB
 15620                                  ;   Outputs:	BX contains the record size
 15621                                  ;   Registers modified: None
 15622                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15623                                  
 15624                                  	; 22/01/2024
 15625                                  	; 07/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15626                                  GetRecSize:
 15627                                  	;mov	bx,[si+0Eh]
 15628 0000220D 8B5C0E                  	MOV	BX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ]	; get his record size
 15629 00002210 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX			; is it nul?
 15630                                  	;jz	short getextd_retn
 15631                                  	; 22/01/2024 (BugFix)
 15632 00002212 75F8                    	jnz	short getextd_retn
 15633                                  	;MOV	BX,128			; use default size
 15634 00002214 B380                    	mov	bl,128	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15635                                  	;mov	[si+0Eh],bx
 15636 00002216 895C0E                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ],BX	; stuff it back
 15637 00002219 C3                      	retn

 15644                                  ;BREAK <$FCB_Random_write_Block - write a block of records to a file >
 15645                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15646                                  ;
 15647                                  ;   $FCB_Random_Write_Block - retrieve a location from the FCB, seek to it
 15648                                  ;	and write a number of blocks from it.
 15649                                  ;
 15650                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an FCB

 15744                                  ;BREAK <FCBIO - do internal FCB I/O>
 15745                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15746                                  ;
 15747                                  ;   FCBIO - look at FCBOP and merge all FCB operations into a single routine.
 15748                                  ;
 15749                                  ;   Inputs:	FCBOP flags which operations need to be performed
 15750                                  ;		DS:DX point to FCB
 15751                                  ;		CX may have count of number of records to xfer
 15752                                  ;   Outputs:	AL has error code
 15753                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 15754                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15755                                  
 15756                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15757                                  	; DOSCODE:5B17h (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15758                                  
 15759                                  	; 23/01/2024
 15760                                  	; DOSCODE:5B2Bh (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS)
 15761                                  
 15762                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15763                                  	; DOSCODE:61C9h (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15764                                  
 15765                                  FCBIO:
 15766                                  
 15767                                  FEOF	EQU	1
 15768                                  FTRIM	EQU	2
 15769                                  
 15770                                  %define	FCBErr	byte [bp-1]  ; byte	
 15771                                  %define	cRec	word [bp-3]  ; word	
 15772                                  ;%define RecPos	word [bp-7]  ; dword
 15773                                  %define RecPosL	word [bp-7]  ; word
 15774                                  %define RecPosH	word [bp-5]  ; word
 15775                                  %define	RecSize	word [bp-9]  ; word
 15776                                  ;%define bPos	word [bp-13] ; dword
 15777                                  %define bPosL	word [bp-13] ; word
 15778                                  %define bPosH	word [bp-11] ; word
 15779                                  %define cByte	word [bp-15] ; word	
 15780                                  %define cResult word [bp-17] ; word	
 15781                                  %define	cRecRes	word [bp-19] ; word
 15782                                  %define	FCBOp	byte [bp-20] ; byte
 15783                                  ; 23/01/2024
 15784                                  %define bPos bp-13
 15785                                  
 15786                                  	;Enter
 15787                                  
 15788 00002230 55                      	push	bp
 15789 00002231 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 15790 00002233 83EC14                  	sub	sp,20
 15791                                  	;mov	[bp-20],al
 15792 00002236 8846EC                  	MOV	FCBOp,AL
 15793                                  	;mov	byte [bp-1],0
 15794 00002239 C646FF00                	MOV	FCBErr,0		;   FCBErr = 0;
 15795 0000223D E8C0FF                  	call	GetExtended		;   FCB = GetExtended ();
 15796                                  	;test	byte [bp-20],8
 15797 00002240 F646EC08                	TEST	FCBOp,BLOCK		;   if ((OP&BLOCK) == 0)
 15798 00002244 7503                    	JNZ	short GetPos
 15799 00002246 B90100                  	MOV	CX,1			;	cRec = 1;
 15800                                  GetPos:
 15801                                  	;mov	[bp-3],cx
 15802 00002249 894EFD                  	MOV	cRec,CX 		;*Tail coalesce
 15803 0000224C E885FF                  	call	GetExtent		;   RecPos = GetExtent ();
 15804 0000224F E8BBFF                  	call	GetRecSize		;   RecSize = GetRecSize ();
 15805                                  	;mov	[bp-9],bx
 15806 00002252 895EF7                  	MOV	RecSize,BX
 15807                                  	;test	byte [bp-20],2
 15808 00002255 F646EC02                	TEST	FCBOp,RANDOM		;   if ((OP&RANDOM) <> 0)
 15809 00002259 7403                    	JZ	short GetRec
 15810 0000225B E868FF                  	call	GetRR			;	RecPos = GetRR ();
 15811                                  GetRec:
 15812                                  	;mov	[bp-7],ax
 15813 0000225E 8946F9                  	MOV	RecPosL,AX		;*Tail coalesce
 15814                                  	;mov	[bp-5],dx
 15815 00002261 8956FB                  	MOV	RecPosH,DX
 15816 00002264 E87FFF                  	call	SetExtent		;   SetExtent (RecPos);
 15817                                  	;mov	ax,[bp-5]
 15818 00002267 8B46FB                  	MOV	AX,RecPosH		;   bPos = RecPos * RecSize;
 15819 0000226A F7E3                    	MUL	BX
 15820 0000226C 89C7                    	MOV	DI,AX
 15821                                  	;mov	ax,[bp-7]
 15822 0000226E 8B46F9                  	MOV	AX,RecPosL
 15823 00002271 F7E3                    	MUL	BX
 15824 00002273 01FA                    	ADD	DX,DI
 15825                                  	;mov	[bp-13],ax
 15826 00002275 8946F3                  	MOV	bPosL,AX
 15827                                  	;mov	[bp-11],dx
 15828 00002278 8956F5                  	MOV	bPosH,DX
 15829                                  	;mov	ax,[bp-3]
 15830 0000227B 8B46FD                  	MOV	AX,cRec 		;   cByte = cRec * RecSize;
 15831 0000227E F7E3                    	MUL	BX
 15832                                  	;mov	[bp-15],ax
 15833 00002280 8946F1                  	MOV	cByte,AX
 15834                                  
 15835                                  ;hkn; 	SS override
 15836 00002283 360306[2C03]            	ADD	AX,[SS:DMAADD]		;   if (cByte+DMA > 64K) {
 15837 00002288 83D200                  	ADC	DX,0
 15838 0000228B 7419                    	JZ	short DoOper
 15839                                  	;mov	byte [bp-1],2
 15840 0000228D C646FF02                	MOV	FCBErr,FTRIM		;	FCBErr = FTRIM;
 15841                                  
 15842                                  ;hkn; 	SS override
 15843 00002291 36A1[2C03]              	MOV	AX,[SS:DMAADD]		;	cRec = (64K-DMA)/RecSize;

 16093                                  ;Break <$FCB_Open - open an old-style FCB>
 16094                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16095                                  ;
 16096                                  ;   $FCB_Open - CPM compatability file open. The user has formatted an FCB
 16097                                  ;	for us and asked to have the rest filled in.
 16098                                  ;
 16099                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an unopenned FCB
 16100                                  ;   Outputs:	AL indicates status 0 is ok FF is error
 16101                                  ;		FCB has the following fields filled in:
 16102                                  ;		    Time/Date Extent/NR Size
 16103                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16104                                  
 16105                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 16106                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:6362h

 16109

 16112

 16114 000023CA B9[3F31]                	MOV	CX,DOS_OPEN

 16116                                  ; The following is common code for Creation and openning of FCBs. AX is
 16117                                  ; either attributes (for create) or open mode (for open)... DS:DX points to
 16118                                  ; the FCB

 16276                                  	;MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time] ; set time
 16277                                  	;;mov	[si+16h],ax
 16278                                  	;MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FTIME],AX
 16279                                  	;;mov	ax,[es:di+0Fh]
 16280                                  	;MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date] ; set date
 16281                                  	;;mov	[si+14h],ax
 16282                                  	;MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FDATE],AX
 16283                                  	;;mov	ax,[es:di+11h]
 16284                                  	;MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size] ; set sizes
 16285                                  	;;mov	[si+10h],ax
 16286                                  	;MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FILSIZ],AX
 16287                                  	;;mov	ax,[es:di+13h]
 16288                                  	;MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size+2]
 16289                                  	;;mov	[si+12h],ax
 16290                                  	;MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FILSIZ+2],AX
 16291                                  	;
 16292 00002470 06                      	push	es
 16293                                  	;les	ax,[es:di+0Dh]
 16294 00002471 26C4450D                	les	ax,[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 16295                                  	;mov	[si+16h],ax
 16296 00002475 894416                  	mov	[si+SYS_FCB.FTIME],ax	; set time
 16297                                  	;mov	[si+14h],es
 16298 00002478 8C4414                  	mov	[si+SYS_FCB.FDATE],es	; set date
 16299 0000247B 07                      	pop	es
 16300 0000247C 06                      	push	es
 16301                                  	;les	ax,[es:di+11h]
 16302 0000247D 26C44511                	les	ax,[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_size] ; set size
 16303                                  	;mov	[si+10h],ax
 16304 00002481 894410                  	mov	[si+SYS_FCB.FILSIZ],ax
 16305                                  	;mov	[si+12h],ax
 16306 00002484 8C4412                  	mov	[si+SYS_FCB.FILSIZ+2],es
 16307 00002487 07                      	pop	es
 16308                                  	;;;
 16309                                  	
 16310 00002488 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			; convenient zero
 16311                                  	;mov	[si+0Ch],ax
 16312 0000248A 89440C                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT],AX	; point to beginning of file
 16313                                  
 16314                                  ; We must scan the set of FCB SFTs for one that appears to match the current
 16315                                  ; one.	We cheat and use CheckFCB to match the FCBs.
 16316                                  
 16317                                  ;hkn; 	SS override
 16318 0000248D 36C43E[4000]            	LES	DI,[SS:SFTFCB]		; get the pointer to head of the list
 16319                                  	;mov	ah,[es:di+4]
 16320 00002492 268A6504                	MOV	AH,[ES:DI+SFT.SFCount]	; get number of SFTs to scan
 16321                                  OpenScan:
 16322                                  	;cmp	al,[si+18h]
 16323 00002496 3A4418                  	CMP	AL,[SI+fcb_sfn]		; don't compare ourselves
 16324 00002499 7407                    	JZ	short SkipCheck
 16325 0000249B 50                      	push	ax			; preserve count
 16326 0000249C E848FC                  	call	CheckFCB		; do they match
 16327 0000249F 58                      	pop	ax			; get count back
 16328 000024A0 7309                    	JNC	short OpenFound		; found a match!
 16329                                  SkipCheck:
 16330 000024A2 FEC0                    	INC	AL			; advance to next FCB
 16331 000024A4 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH			; table full?
 16332 000024A6 75EE                    	JNZ	short OpenScan		; no, go for more
 16333                                  OpenDone:
 16334 000024A8 30C0                    	xor	al,al			; return success
 16335 000024AA C3                      	retn
 16336                                  
 16337                                  ; The SFT at ES:DI is the one that is already in use for this FCB. We set the
 16338                                  ; FCB to use this one. We increment its ref count. We do NOT close it at all.
 16339                                  ; Consider:
 16340                                  ;
 16341                                  ;   open (foo)	delete (foo) open (bar)
 16342                                  ;
 16343                                  ; This causes us to recycle (potentially) bar through the same local SFT as
 16344                                  ; foo even though foo is no longer needed; this is due to the server closing
 16345                                  ; foo for us when we delete it. Unfortunately, we cannot see this closure.
 16346                                  ; If we were to CLOSE bar, the server would then close the only reference to
 16347                                  ; bar and subsequent I/O would be lost to the redirector.
 16348                                  ;
 16349                                  ; This gets solved by NOT closing the sft, but zeroing the ref count
 16350                                  ; (effectively freeing the SFT) and informing the sharer (if relevant) that
 16351                                  ; the SFT is no longer in use. Note that the SHARER MUST keep its ref counts
 16352                                  ; around. This will allow us to access the same file through multiple network
 16353                                  ; connections and NOT prematurely terminate when the ref count on one
 16354                                  ; connection goes to zero.
 16355                                  
 16356                                  OpenFound:
 16357                                  	;mov	[si+18h],al
 16358 000024AB 884418                  	MOV	[SI+fcb_sfn],AL 	; assign with this
 16359 000024AE 26FF05                  	inc	word [es:di]
 16360                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 16361                                  					; remember this new invocation
 16362                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 16363                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 16364                                  	;;;
 16365 000024B1 E8CF23                  	call	set_sftfcb_entry
 16366                                  	;;;
 16367                                  
 16368                                  	; 24/01/2024
 16369 000024B4 16                      	push	ss
 16370 000024B5 1F                      	pop	ds
 16371                                  	
 16372                                  	;MOV	AX,[SS:FCBLRU]		; update LRU counts
 16373 000024B6 A1[1000]                	mov	ax,[FCBLRU] ; 24/01/2024
 16374                                  	;mov	[es:di+15h],ax
 16375 000024B9 26894515                	MOV	[ES:DI+sf_LRU],AX
 16376                                  ;
 16377                                  ; We have an FCB sft that is now of no use. We release sharing info and then
 16378                                  ; blast it to prevent other reuse.
 16379                                  ;
 16380                                  	;push	ss
 16381                                  	;pop	ds
 16382                                  	
 16383 000024BD C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 16384 000024C1 26FF0D                  	dec	word [es:di]
 16385                                  	;DEC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 16386                                  					; free the newly allocated SFT
 16387 000024C4 E8FC5B                  	call	ShareEnd
 16388 000024C7 B043                    	MOV	AL,'C'	 ; 43h
 16389 000024C9 E802FC                  	call	BlastSFT
 16390 000024CC EBDA                    	JMP	short OpenDone
 16391                                  
 16392                                  ;BREAK	<$FCB_Create - create a new directory entry>
 16393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16394                                  ;
 16395                                  ;   $FCB_Create - CPM compatability file create. The user has formatted an
 16396                                  ;	FCB for us and asked to have the rest filled in.
 16397                                  ;
 16398                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an unopenned FCB
 16399                                  ;   Outputs:	AL indicates status 0 is ok FF is error
 16400                                  ;		FCB has the following fields filled in:
 16401                                  ;		    Time/Date Extent/NR Size
 16402                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16403                                  
 16404                                  _$FCB_CREATE:		; System call 22
 16405                                  
 16406                                  ;hkn; DOS_Create is in DOSCODE
 16407 000024CE B9[1130]                	MOV	CX,DOS_CREATE		; routine to call
 16408 000024D1 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			; attributes to create
 16409 000024D3 E82AFD                  	call	GetExtended		; get extended FCB
 16410 000024D6 7403                    	JZ	short DoAccessJ		; not an extended FCB
 16411 000024D8 8A44FF                  	MOV	AL,[SI-1]		; get attributes
 16412                                  DoAccessJ:
 16413 000024DB E9EFFE                  	JMP	DoAccess		; do dirty work
 16414

 16416                                  ; SEARCH.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 16420

 16422
