 19052                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_RENAME - Internal RENAME call for MS-DOS
 19053                                  ;	NAME	DOS_RENAME

 19057                                  ;	DOS_RENAME
 19058                                  ;
 19059                                  ;	Modification history:
 19060                                  ;
 19061                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19062                                  
 19063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19064                                  ;
 19065                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_RENAME
 19066                                  ;
 19067                                  ; Inputs:
 19068                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to SOURCE WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19069                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19070                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string [SOURCE]
 19071                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19072                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19073                                  ;	[REN_WFP] Points to DEST WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19074                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19075                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19076                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19077                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19078                                  ; Function:
 19079                                  ;	Rename the specified file(s)
 19080                                  ;	NOTE: This routine uses most of AUXSTACK as a temp buffer.
 19081                                  ; Outputs:
 19082                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19083                                  ;	    OK
 19084                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19085                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19086                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19087                                  ;			No match for source, or dest path invalid
 19088                                  ;		error_not_same_device
 19089                                  ;			Source and dest are on different devices
 19090                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19091                                  ;			Directory specified (not simple rename),
 19092                                  ;			Device name given, Destination exists.
 19093                                  ;			NOTE: In third case some renames may have
 19094                                  ;			 been done if metas.
 19095                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19096                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19097                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19098                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19099                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19100                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19101                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19102                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 19103                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19104                                  ;
 19105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19106                                  
 19107                                  	; 14/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19108                                  	; 31/01/2024 Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19109

 19111                                  
 19112                                  ;hkn; DOS_RENAME is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up

 19121                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 17
 19122                                  	;INT	2FH
 19123                                  	;return
 19124                                  
 19125 00002CF7 B81111                  	mov     ax, 1111h
 19126 00002CFA CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - RENAME REMOTE FILE
 19127                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, 
 19128                                  			; SDA first filename pointer = offset of fully-qualified old name
 19129                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19130                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19131 00002CFC C3                      	retn
 19132                                  ;ENDIF

 19629                                  ;Input: DS:SI -> raw string with ?
 19630                                  ;	ES:DI -> destination string
 19631                                  ;	DS:BX -> source string
 19632                                  ;Function: replace ? chars of raw string with chars in source string and
 19633                                  ;	   put in destination string

 19637                                  NEW_RENAME:
 19638                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19639                                  NEWNAM:
 19640                                  	; DOSCODE:680Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 19641 00002F1D AC                      	LODSB
 19642 00002F1E 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?" ; 3Fh
 19643 00002F20 7502                    	JNZ	short NOCHG
 19644 00002F22 8A07                    	MOV	AL,[BX] 		; Get replace char
 19645                                  NOCHG:
 19646 00002F24 AA                      	STOSB
 19647 00002F25 43                      	INC	BX			; Next replace char
 19648 00002F26 E2F5                    	LOOP	NEWNAM
 19649                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19650                                  gs_ret_label:	; 18/12/2022

 19672                                  
 19673                                  ;SUBTTL GET_FILE_INFO -- Get File Information
 19674                                  
 19675                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19676                                  ; Procedure Name : GET_FILE_INFO
 19677                                  ;
 19678                                  ; Inputs:
 19679                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19680                                  ;		terminated)
 19681                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19682                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19683                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19684                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19685                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19686                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19687                                  ; Function:
 19688                                  ;	Get Information about a file
 19689                                  ; Returns:
 19690                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19691                                  ;	    AX = Attribute of file
 19692                                  ;	    CX = Time stamp of file
 19693                                  ;	    DX = Date stamp of file
 19694                                  ;	    BX:DI = Size of file (32 bit)
 19695                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19696                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19697                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19698                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19699                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19700                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19701                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19702                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19703                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19704                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19705                                  
 19706                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19707                                  
 19708                                  GET_FILE_INFO:
 19709                                  
 19710                                  ;hkn; get_file_info is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set 
 19711                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19712                                  
 19713 00002F29 E8EEE8                  	call	TestNet
 19714 00002F2C 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_INFO
 19715                                  
 19716                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19717                                  ;	transfer NET_GET_FILE_INFO
 19718                                  ;ELSE
 19719                                  ;	MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 15
 19720                                  ;	INT	2FH
 19721                                  ;	return
 19722                                  
 19723 00002F2E B80F11                  	mov     ax, 110Fh
 19724 00002F31 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET REMOTE FILE'S ATTRIBUTES
 19725                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 19726                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19727                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = file attributes
 19728 00002F33 C3                      	retn
 19729                                  ;ENDIF
 19730                                  
 19731                                  LOCAL_INFO:
 19732 00002F34 E861E9                  	call	ECritDisk

 19734

 19738

 19740                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19741                                  	;call	GET_FAST_PATH
 19742                                  
 19743                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19744 00002F3F 7312                    	JNC	short info_check_dev
 19745                                  NO_PATH:
 19746 00002F41 750B                    	JNZ	short bad_path1
 19747 00002F43 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 19748 00002F45 7407                    	JZ	short bad_path1

 19762                                  
 19763                                  info_check_dev:
 19764 00002F53 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 19765 00002F55 78F0                    	JS	short info_no_file	; device
 19766                                  
 19767                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19768                                  ;SR;
 19769                                  ; If root dir then CurBuf == -1. Check for this case and return subdir attr
 19770                                  ;for a root dir
 19771                                  
 19772 00002F57 833E[E205]FF            	cmp	word [CURBUF],-1	;is it a root dir?
 19773 00002F5C 7506                    	jne	short not_root		;no, CurBuf ptr is valid
 19774                                  
 19775 00002F5E 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 19776 00002F60 B010                    	mov	al,attr_directory ; 10h
 19777                                  	;clc
 19778                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19779                                  	; (DOSCODE:683Eh)
 19780                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19781                                  	;clc
 19782 00002F62 EBE7                    	jmp	short JustRet
 19783                                  
 19784                                  not_root:
 19785                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19786 00002F64 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 19787 00002F65 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 19788 00002F69 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19789 00002F6B 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX			; Assume size=0 (dir)
 19790 00002F6D 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 19791                                  	;mov	cx,[si+16h]
 19792 00002F6F 8B4C16                  	MOV	CX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_time]
 19793                                  	;mov	dx,[si+18h]
 19794 00002F72 8B5418                  	MOV	DX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_date]
 19795 00002F75 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 19796                                  	;mov	al,[si+0Bh]
 19797 00002F77 8A440B                  	MOV	AL,[SI+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 19798                                  	;test	al,10h
 19799 00002F7A A810                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory
 19800 00002F7C 7506                    	JNZ	short NO_SIZE
 19801                                  	;mov	di,[si+1Ch]
 19802 00002F7E 8B7C1C                  	MOV	DI,[SI+dir_entry.dir_size_l]
 19803                                  	;mov	bx,[si+1Eh]
 19804 00002F81 8B5C1E                  	MOV	BX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_size_h]
 19805                                  NO_SIZE:
 19806 00002F84 1F                      	POP	DS
 19807                                  	;CLC
 19808                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19809                                  	; (DOSCODE:6864h)
 19810                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19811                                  	;clc
 19812 00002F85 EBC4                    	jmp	short JustRet

 19814                                  ;Break	<SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE -- Set File Attribute>
 19815                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19816                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19817                                  ; Inputs:
 19818                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19819                                  ;		terminated)
 19820                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19821                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19822                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19823                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19824                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19825                                  ;	[SATTRIB] is attribute of search (determines what files may be found)
 19826                                  ;	AX is new attributes to give to file
 19827                                  ; Function:
 19828                                  ;	Set File Attributes
 19829                                  ; Returns:
 19830                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19831                                  ;	    No error
 19832                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19833                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19834                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19835                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19836                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19837                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19838                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19839                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19840                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19841                                  ;			Attempt to set an attribute which cannot be set
 19842                                  ;			(attr_directory, attr_volume_ID)
 19843                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19844                                  ;			Sharing mode of file did not allow the change
 19845                                  ;			(this request requires exclusive write/read access)
 19846                                  ;			(INT 24H generated)
 19847                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19848                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19849                                  
 19850                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19851                                  
 19852                                  SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE:
 19853                                  
 19854                                  ;hkn; set_file_attr is called from file.asm. DS has been set 
 19855                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19856                                  
 19857 00002F87 A9D8FF                  	TEST	AX,~attr_changeable ; 0FFD8h
 19858 00002F8A 7412                    	JZ	short set_look
 19859                                  _BAD_ACC:
 19860                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 19861                                  	;;;
 19862                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19863                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19864 00002F8C E83FE3                  	call	set_exerr_locus_unk
 19865                                  	;;;
 19866 00002F8F C606[2703]07            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_CLASS],errCLASS_Apperr ; 7
 19867 00002F94 C606[2603]04            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_ACTION],errACT_Abort ; 4
 19868 00002F99 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied ; 5
 19869 00002F9C F9                      	STC
 19870 00002F9D C3                      	retn
 19871                                  	
 19872                                  set_look:
 19873 00002F9E E879E8                  	call	TestNet

 19875                                  
 19876                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19877                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19878                                  ;ELSE
 19879 00002FA3 50                      	PUSH	AX
 19880                                  	
 19881                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 14
 19882                                  	;INT	2FH
 19883                                  
 19884 00002FA4 B80E11                  	mov     ax, 110Eh
 19885 00002FA7 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - SET REMOTE FILE'S ATTRIBUTES
 19886                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 19887                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19888                                  			; STACK: WORD new file attributes
 19889                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19890                                  
 19891 00002FA9 5B                      	POP	BX			; clean stack
 19892 00002FAA C3                      	retn
 19893                                  ;ENDIF

 19895                                  LOCAL_SET:
 19896 00002FAB E8EAE8                  	call	ECritDisk

 19900 00002FB7 7308                    	JNC	short set_check_device
 19901 00002FB9 5B                      	POP	BX			; Clean stack (don't zap AX)
 19902 00002FBA EB85                    	JMP	short NO_PATH
 19903                                  
 19904                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19905                                  cannot_set_root:			; M025:
 19906 00002FBC B80500                  	mov	ax,error_access_denied	; M025: return error is attempting
 19907                                  	;stc				; M025: to set attr. of root
 19908                                  	;jmp	short OK_BYE		; M025:
 19909                                  	; 01/02/2024
 19910 00002FBF EB89                    	jmp	short BadRet
 19911

 19918

 19921

 19924 00002FD1 74E9                    	je	short cannot_set_root	; M025: Y: return error
 19925                                  
 19926                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19927 00002FD3 E89EFC                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 19928 00002FD6 7305                    	JNC	short set_do
 19929 00002FD8 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation ; 32

 19931                                  
 19932                                  set_do:
 19933                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19934 00002FDD C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 19935 00002FE1 2680670BD8              	AND	BYTE [ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],~attr_changeable ; 0D8h
 19936 00002FE6 2608470B                	OR	BYTE [ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],AL
 19937                                  
 19938                                  ; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19939                                  %if 0
 19940                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19941                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 19942                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 19943                                  	JNZ	short yesdirty3		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 19944                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 19945                                  	
 19946                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 19947                                  yesdirty3:
 19948                                  %else
 19949                                  	; 01/02/2024
 19950                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19951 00002FEA E83138                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 19952                                  %endif
 19953 00002FED A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]
 19954                                  
 19955                                  ;;;; 10/1/86 F.C update fastopen cache
 19956                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 19957                                  	;PUSH	DX

 19966                                  
 19967 00002FF0 E80537                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 19968 00002FF3 7303                    	JNC	short OK_BYE

 19970                                  OK_BYE:

 19982                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 19983                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 19984                                  ;
 19985                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 19986                                  ;
 19987                                  ;	Modification history:
 19988                                  ;
 19989                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19990                                  
 19991                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 19992                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19993                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 19994                                  ;
 19995                                  ; Inputs:
 19996                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 19997                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 19998                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 19999                                  ; Function:
 20000                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 20001                                  ; Returns:
 20002                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 20003                                  ;    Carry clear
 20004                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 20005                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 20006                                  ; NOTE:
 20007                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 20008                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 20009                                  ;	that time.
 20010                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20011                                  
 20012                                  DOS_DUP:
 20013                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20014                                  
 20015                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20016 00002FFB 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 20017 00003000 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 20018                                  
 20019                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 20020                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 20021 00003005 E82BE8                  	call	IsSFTNet
 20022 00003008 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 20023 0000300A E8A41E                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 20024                                  DO_INC:
 20025                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 20026 0000300D 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 20027                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 20028 00003010 C3                      	retn
 20029

 20036                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 20037                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 20038                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20039                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20040                                  ;
 20041                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 20042                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 20043                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 20044                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 20045                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 20046                                  ;
 20047                                  ;	Revision history:
 20048                                  ;
 20049                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 20050                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 20051                                  
 20052                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20053                                  
 20054                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20055                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20056                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 20057                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 20058                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 20059                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 20060                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 20061                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 20062                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 20063                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 20064                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 20065                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 20066                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 20067                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 20068                                  
 20069                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 20070                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20071                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 20072                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 20073                                  ;
 20074                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 20075                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 20076                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20077                                  ;			terminated)
 20078                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20079                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20080                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20081                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20082                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20083                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20084                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20085                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20086                                  ;
 20087                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20088                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 20089                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 20090                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20091                                  ;		CARRY SET
 20092                                  ;		    AX is error code
 20093                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 20094                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20095                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 20096                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 20097                                  ;			error_access_denied
 20098                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 20099                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 20100                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 20101                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20102                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 20103                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 20104                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20105                                  
 20106                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20107                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20108                                  
 20109                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20110                                  	; DOSCODE:708Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 20111                                  
 20112                                  DOS_CREATE:
 20113                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20114                                  	; DOSCODE:6934h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20115                                  
 20116                                  ;hkn; dispatched to from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS set up to DOSDATA at 
 20117                                  ;hkn; this point.
 20118                                  
 20119 00003011 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH		; Truncate is OK
 20120                                  
 20121                                  ;	Enter here from Dos_Create_New
 20122                                  ;
 20123                                  ;	(ah) = 0 iff truncate OK
 20124                                  
 20125                                  Create_inter:
 20126 00003013 A8C0                    	TEST	AL,~(attr_all+attr_ignore+attr_volume_id) ; 80h
 20127                                  				; Mask out any meaningless bits
 20128 00003015 7511                    	JNZ	short AttErr
 20129 00003017 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id
 20130 00003019 7407                    	JZ	short NoReset
 20131                                  	
 20132                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20133                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20134 0000301B 800E[1106]80            	OR	byte [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h ;AN000;FOR dbcs volid
 20135                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 20136                                  	;or	word [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h 
 20137                                  	
 20138 00003020 B008                    	MOV	AL,attr_volume_id ; 8
 20139                                  NoReset:
 20140 00003022 0C20                    	OR	AL,attr_archive ; File changed  ; 20h
 20141 00003024 A850                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory+attr_device ; 50h
 20142 00003026 7408                    	JZ	short ATT_OK
 20143                                  AttErr:
 20144 00003028 B80500                  	MOV	AX,5		; Attribute problem
 20145                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 20146                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20147 0000302B E8A0E2                  	call	set_exerr_locus_unk
 20148 0000302E EB62                    	JMP	SHORT SET_MKND_ERR ; Gotta use MKDIR to make dirs, NEVER allow
 20149                                  				   ;	attr_device to be set.
 20150                                  ATT_OK:
 20151 00003030 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20152 00003034 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20153 00003035 C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 20154 00003039 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1
 20155 0000303C 751B                    	JNE	short TEST_RE_NET
 20156                                  
 20157                                  ;	No CDS, it must be redirected.
 20158                                  
 20159 0000303E 07                      	POP	ES
 20160                                  
 20161                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20162                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20163                                  	;test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],1
 20164 0000303F F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20165 00003044 740D                    	JZ	short NOEXTOP 		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20166                                  IFS_extopen:				    ;AN000;EO.
 20167 00003046 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO. pass create attr
 20168                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;AN000;EO. issue extended open verb
 20169 00003047 B82E11                  	mov	ax,112Eh
 20170                                  NOEXTOP2:	; 01/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20171 0000304A CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;AN000;EO.
 20172 0000304C 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;AN000;EO. trash bx
 20173 0000304D C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;AN000;EO.
 20174 00003052 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.
 20175                                  NOEXTOP:				    ;AN000;
 20176                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20177                                  
 20178                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20179                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_CREATE
 20180                                  ;ELSE
 20181 00003053 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20182                                  
 20183                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 24
 20184                                  	;INT	2FH
 20185                                  
 20186 00003054 B81811                  	mov     ax,1118h
 20187                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20188                                  	;int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE FILE
 20189                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20190                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 20191                                  			; STACK: WORD file creation mode???
 20192                                  
 20193                                  	;POP	BX			; BX is trashed anyway
 20194                                  	;retn
 20195 00003057 EBF1                    	jmp	short NOEXTOP2 ; 01/02/2024
 20196                                  ;ENDIF
 20197                                  
 20198                                  ;	We have a CDS. See if it's network
 20199                                  
 20200                                  TEST_RE_NET:
 20201                                  	;;test	word [es:si+43h],8000h
 20202                                  	;TEST	word [ES:SI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 20203                                  	; 07/12/2022
 20204                                  	;test	byte [es:si+44h],80h
 20205                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20206 00003059 26F6444480              	test	byte [ES:SI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 20207 0000305E 07                      	POP	ES
 20208 0000305F 7417                    	JZ	short LOCAL_CREATE
 20209                                  
 20210                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20211 00003061 E8C700                  	CALL	Set_EXT_mode		    ;AN000;EO.
 20212 00003064 7205                    	JC	SHORT dochk		    ;AN000;EO.
 20213                                  	;;or	word [es:di+2],2
 20214                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both ;IFS.
 20215                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20216 00003066 26804D0202              	or	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both ;IFS.
 20217                                  
 20218                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20219                                  dochk:
 20220 0000306B F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20221 00003070 75D4                    	JNZ	short IFS_extopen	    ;AN000;EO. yes, issue extended open
 20222                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20223                                  
 20224                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20225                                  ;	transfer NET_CREATE
 20226                                  ;ELSE
 20227 00003072 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20228                                  	
 20229                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 23
 20230                                  	;INT	2FH
 20231                                  	
 20232 00003073 B81711                  	mov     ax,1117h
 20233                                  	
 20234                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20235                                  	;int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE REMOTE FILE
 20236                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20237                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
 20238                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 20239                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 20240                                  
 20241                                  	;POP	BX			; BX is trashed anyway
 20242                                  ;nomore:
 20243                                  	;retn
 20244 00003076 EBD2                    	jmp	short NOEXTOP2 ; 01/02/2024
 20245                                  ;ENDIF

 20247                                  ;**	It's a local create. We have a local CDS for it.
 20248                                  
 20249                                  LOCAL_CREATE:
 20250                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20251 00003078 E8B000                  	CALL	Set_EXT_mode	;AN000;EO. set mode if from extended open
 20252 0000307B 7205                    	JC	short setdone	;AN000;EO.
 20253                                  	
 20254                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20255                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20256                                  	;;or	word [es:di+2],2
 20257                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 20258                                  	;or	byte [es:di+2],2
 20259 0000307D 26804D0202              	or	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 20260                                  setdone:
 20261 00003082 E813E8                  	call	ECritDisk
 20262 00003085 E85F20                  	call	MakeNode
 20263 00003088 7317                    	JNC	short Create_ok
 20264 0000308A C606[A10A]FF            	mov	byte [VOLCHNG_FLAG],-1	; indicate no change in volume label
 20265 0000308F E833E8                  	call	LCritDisk
 20266                                  
 20267                                  	;entry	SET_MKND_ERR
 20268                                  SET_MKND_ERR:
 20269                                  
 20270                                  ;	Looks up MakeNode errors and converts them. AL is MakeNode
 20271                                  ;	error, SI is GETPATH bad spot return if path_not_found error.
 20272                                  
 20273                                  ;hkn; CRTERRTAB is in TABLE seg (DOSCODE)
 20274 00003092 BB[9930]                	MOV     BX,CRTERRTAB
 20275                                  	;XLAT  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20276                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20277 00003095 2E                      	CS
 20278 00003096 D7                      	XLAT
 20279                                  CreatBadRet:
 20280 00003097 F9                      	STC
 20281 00003098 C3                      	retn
 20282                                  
 20283                                  ; 13/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20284                                  ; DOSCODE:69C4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20285                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20286                                  
 20287                                  ;** Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20288                                  
 20289                                  ; 17/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20290                                  ; Offset 12B1h of IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987
 20291                                  
 20292                                  ;CRTERRTAB: ; 19/07/2018 - MSDOS 3.3	
 20293                                  ;	db	0,5,52h,50h,3,5,20h
 20294                                  
 20295                                  ;CRTERRTAB: ; 18/05/2019 - MSDOS 6.0	
 20296                                  ;	db	0,5,52h,50h,3,5,20h,2
 20297                                  
 20298                                  ; 08/08/2018
 20299                                  
 20300                                  CRTERRTAB:	;LABEL BYTE	; Lookup table for MakeNode returns
 20301 00003099 00                      	DB	0			; none
 20302 0000309A 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 1
 20303 0000309B 52                      	DB	error_cannot_make	; MakeNode error 2
 20304 0000309C 50                      	DB	error_file_exists	; MakeNode error 3
 20305 0000309D 03                      	DB	error_path_not_found	; MakeNode error 4
 20306 0000309E 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 5
 20307 0000309F 20                      	DB	error_sharing_violation ; MakeNode error 6
 20308                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20309 000030A0 02                      	DB	error_file_not_found	; MakeNode error 7
 20310                                  
 20311                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20312                                  
 20313                                  ; We have just created a new file. This results in the truncation of old
 20314                                  ; files. We must inform the sharer to slash all the open SFT's for this
 20315                                  ; file to the current size.
 20316                                  
 20317                                  ; If we created a volume id on the diskette, set the VOLCHNG_FLAG to logical
 20318                                  ; drive number to force a Build BPB after Media Check.
 20319                                  
 20320                                  ;;; FASTOPEN 8/29/86
 20321                                  Create_ok:
 20322                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 20323                                  	;call	FastOpen_Delete
 20324                                  ;;; FASTOPEN 8/29/86
 20325 000030A1 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 20326 000030A4 A808                    	test	al,attr_volume_id
 20327 000030A6 741C                    	jz	short NoVolLabel
 20328 000030A8 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 20329                                  	;mov	ah,[ES:DI+curdir.text]	; get drive letter
 20330 000030AC 268A25                  	mov	ah,[ES:DI] ; 09/08/2018
 20331 000030AF 80EC41                  	sub	ah,'A'	; 41h		; convert to drive number
 20332 000030B2 8826[A10A]              	mov	[VOLCHNG_FLAG],ah	;Set flag to indicate volid change
 20333                                  	
 20334                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20335                                  
 20336                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20337 000030B6 B701                    	MOV	BH,1			;AN000;>32mb set volume id to boot record
 20338 000030B8 E81F00                  	CALL	Set_Media_ID		;AN000;>32mb
 20339                                  	
 20340 000030BB E8DAE7                  	call	ECritDisk
 20341 000030BE E8FA30                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; force a media check
 20342 000030C1 E801E8                  	call	LCritDisk
 20343                                  
 20344                                  NoVolLabel:
 20345 000030C4 B80200                  	MOV	ax,2
 20346 000030C7 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20347                                  ;if installed
 20348                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 20349 000030CB FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)] ; 14 = ShSU
 20350                                  ;else
 20351                                  ;	Call	ShSU
 20352                                  ;endif
 20353 000030CF E8F3E7                  	call	LCritDisk
 20354 000030D2 E94501                  	jmp	SET_SFT_MODE
 20355                                  
 20356                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20357                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 20358                                  ;
 20359                                  ; Inputs:
 20360                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20361                                  ;		terminated)
 20362                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20363                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20364                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20365                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20366                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20367                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20368                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20369                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20370                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 20371                                  ; Function:
 20372                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 20373                                  ; Outputs:
 20374                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20375                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20376                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20377                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 20378                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20379                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20380                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20381                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20382                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20383                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20384                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20385                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 20386                                  ;		error_file_exists
 20387                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 20388                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20389                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20390                                  
 20391                                  DOS_Create_New:
 20392 000030D5 B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 20393 000030D7 E939FF                  	JMP	Create_inter
 20394                                  
 20395                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 20396                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20397                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_Media_ID
 20398                                  ;
 20399                                  ; Inputs:
 20400                                  ;	NAME1= Volume ID
 20401                                  ;	BH= 0, delete volume id
 20402                                  ;	    1, set new volume id
 20403                                  ;	DS= DOSGROUP
 20404                                  ; Function:
 20405                                  ;	Set Volume ID to DOS 4.00 Boot record.
 20406                                  ; Outputs:
 20407                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20408                                  ;	    volume id set
 20409                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20410                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20411                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20412                                  
 20413                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20414                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 20415                                  Set_Media_ID:
 20416 000030DA 50                      	PUSH	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20417 000030DB 06                      	PUSH	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 20418 000030DC 57                      	PUSH	DI		;AN000;;>32mb
 20419                                  
 20420 000030DD FEC4                    	INC	AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive #
 20421 000030DF 88E3                    	MOV	BL,AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive # (A=1,B=2,,,)
 20422 000030E1 B00D                    	MOV	AL,0DH		;AN000;;>32mb  generic IOCTL
 20423                                  	;MOV	CX,0866H	;AN001;;>32mb  get media id
 20424                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20425                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20426 000030E3 B96648                  	mov	cx,4866h	; ch = FAT32 disk drive (CATEGORY CODE)
 20427                                  				; cl = minor code,
 20428                                  				;      get volume serial number (and name)
 20429                                  
 20430                                  ;hkn; PACKET_TEMP is in DOSDATA
 20431 000030E6 BA[A00D]                	MOV	DX,Packet_Temp	;AN000;>32mb
 20432                                  
 20433                                  Set_Media_ID_1:
 20434                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20435 000030E9 51                      	push	cx
 20436                                  
 20437 000030EA 53                      	PUSH	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20438 000030EB 52                      	PUSH	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20439 000030EC 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 20440                                  
 20441                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb
 20442 000030EE E849F7                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 20443                                  
 20444 000030F1 5A                      	POP	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20445 000030F2 5B                      	POP	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20446                                  
 20447                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20448 000030F3 59                      	pop	cx
 20449                                  	;JC	short geterr	;AN000;;>32mb
 20450 000030F4 730A                    	jnc	short Set_Media_ID_2
 20451 000030F6 80FD48                  	cmp	ch,48h		; is it FAT32 disk drive request?
 20452 000030F9 F9                      	stc
 20453 000030FA 7529                    	jne	short geterr	; (ch=8 request failed!)
 20454 000030FC B508                    	mov	ch,8		; set category code for (old) FAT disk drive
 20455                                  				; (except FAT32)
 20456 000030FE EBE9                    	jmp     short Set_Media_ID_1 ; and try again
 20457                                  
 20458                                  Set_Media_ID_2:
 20459 00003100 08FF                    	OR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb delete volume id

 20475

 20477                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet

 20479

 20481
