 30520 00004FBA 16                      	PUSH	SS
 30521 00004FBB 07                      	POP	ES
 30522                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 30523 00004FBC BF[5A03]                	MOV	DI,DEVCALL
 30524                                  
 30525 00004FBF AA                      	STOSB				; length
 30526 00004FC0 58                      	POP	AX			; 
 30527 00004FC1 AA                      	STOSB				; Unit
 30528 00004FC2 50                      	PUSH	AX
 30529 00004FC3 88C8                    	MOV	AL,CL
 30530 00004FC5 AA                      	STOSB				; Command code
 30531 00004FC6 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 30532 00004FC8 AB                      	STOSW				; Status
 30533 00004FC9 83C708                  	ADD	DI,8			; Skip link fields
 30534 00004FCC 58                      	POP	AX
 30535 00004FCD 86C4                    	XCHG	AH,AL
 30536 00004FCF AA                      	STOSB				; Media byte
 30537 00004FD0 86E0                    	XCHG	AL,AH
 30538 00004FD2 50                      	PUSH	AX
 30539 00004FD3 89D8                    	MOV	AX,BX
 30540 00004FD5 AB                      	STOSW

 30543 00004FD8 AB                      	STOSW				; Transfer addr
 30544

 30546 00004FDA 58                      	POP	AX			; Real CX
 30547 00004FDB AB                      	STOSW				; Count
 30548

 30550 00004FDD AB                      	STOSW				; Start
 30551 00004FDE 91                      	XCHG	AX,CX
 30552 00004FDF 87CA                    	XCHG	DX,CX
 30553 00004FE1 5F                      	POP	DI
 30554                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 30555 00004FE2 BB[5A03]                	MOV	BX,DEVCALL
 30556 00004FE5 C3                      	retn

 30558                                  	;entry	SETWRITE
 30559                                  SETWRITE:
 30560                                  
 30561                                  ; Inputs:
 30562                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer Address
 30563                                  ;	CX = Record Count
 30564                                  ;	DX = Starting Record
 30565                                  ;	AH = Media Byte
 30566                                  ;	AL = Unit Code
 30567                                  ; Function:
 30568                                  ;	Set up the device call header at DEVCALL
 30569                                  ; Output:
 30570                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 30571                                  ; No other registers effected

 30574 00004FE7 51                      	PUSH	CX
 30575 00004FE8 50                      	PUSH	AX
 30576 00004FE9 B108                    	MOV	CL,DEVWRT ; mov cl,8
 30577 00004FEB 36020E[FF02]            	ADD	CL,[SS:VERFLG]		; SS override
 30578 00004FF0 EBC6                    	JMP	SHORT SETCALLHEAD
 30579                                  
 30580                                  ; 22/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 30581                                  %if 0	; SC
 30582                                  
 30583                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30584                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30585                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30586                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30587                                  
 30588                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 30589                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30590                                  ;
 30591                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 30592                                  ;
 30593                                  ; Inputs:
 30594                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 30595                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 30596                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 30597                                  ; Function:
 30598                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 30599                                  ; Output:
 30600                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 30601                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 30602                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 30603                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 30604                                  ;
 30605                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30606                                  
 30607                                  RW_SC:
 30608                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 30609                                  	
 30610                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 30611                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30612                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 30613                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30614                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30615                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30616                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 30617                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30618                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 30619                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30620                                  
 30621                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 30622                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 30623                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30624                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 30625                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 30626                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 30627                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 30628                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30629                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 30630                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 30631                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 30632                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 30633                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30634                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 30635                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 30636                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 30637                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 30638                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 30639                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 30640                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30641                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 30642                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 30643                                  chklow: 						
 30644                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 30645                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 30646                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 30647                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 30648                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 30649                                  readsr:
 30650                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 30651                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 30652                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 30653                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30654                                  
 30655                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 30656                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 30657                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30658                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30659                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 30660                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 30661                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 30662                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 30663                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 30664                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30665                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30666                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 30667                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30668                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 30669                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 30670                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 30671                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30672                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30673                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 30674                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 30675                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 30676                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 30677                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30678                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 30679                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30680                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 30681                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30682                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30683                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30684                                  
 30685                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 30686                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30687                                  ;
 30688                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 30689                                  ;
 30690                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30691                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30692                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30693                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30694                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30695                                  ; Function:
 30696                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 30697                                  ; Output:
 30698                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 30699                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 30700                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 30701                                  ;
 30702                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30703                                  
 30704                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30705                                  IN_SC:
 30706                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30707                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 30708                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 30709                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30710                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 30711                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 30712                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 30713                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 30714                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30715                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 30716                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30717                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 30718                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30719                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 30720                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 30721                                  	; 16/12/2022
 30722                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 30723                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30724                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 30725                                  
 30726                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 30727                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30728                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30729                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30730                                  
 30731                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 30732                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30733                                  ;
 30734                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 30735                                  ;
 30736                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30737                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30738                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30739                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30740                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 30741                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30742                                  ;
 30743                                  ; Function:
 30744                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 30745                                  ; Output:
 30746                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 30747                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30748                                  
 30749                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 30750                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30751                                  
 30752                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 30753                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30754                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 30755                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 30756                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30757                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 30758                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30759                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30760                                  
 30761                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30762                                  ; 22/11/2022
 30763                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30764                                  
 30765                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 30766                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30767                                  ;
 30768                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 30769                                  ;
 30770                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 30771                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 30772                                  ; Function:
 30773                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30774                                  ; Output:
 30775                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 30776                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 30777                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 30778                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 30779                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 30780                                  ;     
 30781                                  ;		       0 if failed
 30782                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30783                                  
 30784                                  VIRREAD:
 30785                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30786                                  
 30787                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 30788                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30789                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 30790                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30791                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30792                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 30793                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 30794                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 30795                                  
 30796                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 30797                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 30798                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30799                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30800                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30801                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30802                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30803                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30804                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30805                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30806                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30807                                  	POP	CX
 30808                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30809                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30810                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30811                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30812                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30813                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 30814                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 30815                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 30816                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 30817                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 30818                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 30819                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30820                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 30821                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30822                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30823                                  
 30824                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 30825                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30826                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30827                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30828                                  
 30829                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30831                                  ;
 30832                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30833                                  ;
 30834                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30835                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30836                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30837                                  ; Function:
 30838                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30839                                  ; Output:
 30840                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30841                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30842                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30843                                  
 30844                                  SC2BUF:
 30845                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30846                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 30847                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30848                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30849                                  	jc	short sexit
 30850                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30851                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30852                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30853                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30854                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30855                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30856                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30857                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30858                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30859                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30860                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30861                                  	mul	cx
 30862                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30863                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30864                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30865                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30866                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30867                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30868                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30869                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30870                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30871                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30872                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 30873                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 30874                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30875                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30876                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30877                                  nodd:
 30878                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30879                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30880                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30881                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30882                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30883                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30884                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30885                                  
 30886                                  %endif	; SC

 30895                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 30896                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 30897                                  
 30898                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 30899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30900                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 30901                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 30902                                  ;
 30903                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 30904                                  ;	SETDOTENT

 30920                                  ;
 30921                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30922                                  ;
 30923                                  ; Inputs:
 30924                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30925                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30926                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30927                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30928                                  ;               entries
 30929                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30930                                  ; Function:
 30931                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30932                                  ; Outputs:
 30933                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30934                                  ;       ELSE
 30935                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30936                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30937                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30938                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]

 31167                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31168                                  ;
 31169                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31170                                  ;
 31171                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31172                                  ;
 31173                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31174                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31175                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31176                                  ;
 31177                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31178                                  
 31179                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31180                                  
 31181                                  SETDOTENT:
 31182                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31183 000050C0 AB                      	STOSW
 31184 000050C1 B90400                  	MOV	CX,4
 31185 000050C4 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 31186 000050C7 F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31187 000050C9 AA                      	STOSB
 31188                                  
 31189                                  ;	Set up attribute
 31190                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31191 000050CA B010                    	MOV	AL,attr_directory
 31192 000050CC AA                      	STOSB
 31193                                  
 31194                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 31195                                  	;ADD	DI,10
 31196                                  	; 23/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31197                                  	;;;
 31198 000050CD 83C708                  	add	di,8
 31199 000050D0 A1[F20A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]
 31200 000050D3 AB                      	stosw		; Set up first cluster field (hw)
 31201                                  	;;;	
 31202 000050D4 8B36[9E05]              	MOV	SI,[THISSFT]
 31203                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]

 31205 000050DB AB                      	STOSW
 31206                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 31207 000050DC 8B440F                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 31208 000050DF AB                      	STOSW
 31209

 31211 000050E0 89D0                    	MOV	AX,DX
 31212 000050E2 AB                      	STOSW
 31213

 31215                                  	;XOR	AX,AX

 31218 000050E5 AB                      	STOSW

 31221                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31222                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31223                                  ;
 31224                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31225                                  ;
 31226                                  ; Inputs:
 31227                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31228                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31229                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31230                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31231                                  ;
 31232                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31233                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31234                                  ;
 31235                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31236                                  ;               terminated)
 31237                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31238                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31239                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31240                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31241                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31242                                  ; Function:
 31243                                  ;       Make a new node
 31244                                  ; Outputs:
 31245                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31246                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31247                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31248                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31249                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31250                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31251                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31252                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31253                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31254                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31255                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31256                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31257                                  ;       ELSE
 31258                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31259                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31260                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31261                                  ;               containing new node.
 31262                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31263                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31264                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31265                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31266                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31267                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31268                                  ;
 31269                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31270                                  
 31271                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31272                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31273                                  
 31274                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31275                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31276                                  
 31277                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31278                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31279                                  
 31280                                  MakeNode:
 31281                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31282 000050E7 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31283 000050ED 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 31284 000050EE C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31285 000050F3 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 31286 000050F6 E88BF8                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 31287 000050F9 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 31288                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 31289                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31290 000050FB 91                      	xchg	ax,cx
 31291 000050FC 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 31292 000050FD 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31293 000050FF 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31294 00005101 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31295 00005104 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31296                                  make_err_4:
 31297 00005106 B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31298                                  make_err_ret:
 31299                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31300                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31301 00005108 98                      	cbw
 31302 00005109 F9                      	STC
 31303                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31304 0000510A C3                      	retn
 31305                                  
 31306                                  	;entry	RENAME_MAKE	; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 31307                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31308                                  make_type:
 31309                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31310                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31311                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 31312 0000510B F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 31313 00005110 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31314 00005112 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31315                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31316                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31317 00005117 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31318 0000511C 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31319 0000511E F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31320 0000511F B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31321                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31322                                  make_retn:
 31323                                  	;return
 31324 00005122 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31325                                  
 31326                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31327                                  
 31328                                  make_type2:
 31329 00005123 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31330 00005127 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31331 00005129 F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31332 0000512A EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31333                                  
 31334                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31335                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31336                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31337                                  ;   else => file
 31338                                  
 31339                                  make_exists:
 31340 0000512C 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31341 0000512E B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31342                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31343 00005130 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31344 00005135 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31345                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31346                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31347 00005137 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31348 00005139 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31349 0000513B 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31350 0000513D 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31351 0000513F 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31352 00005140 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31353                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31354 00005144 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31355                                  	;test	ch,1
 31356 00005148 F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 31357 0000514B 7523                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files

 31359 00005150 59                      	POP	CX		; Devid back in CH
 31360 00005151 751E                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 31361 00005153 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL		; AL = 0, Disk Node
 31362                                  make_share:
 31363                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31364                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31365 00005155 98                      	cbw
 31366 00005156 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save Disk or Device node
 31367 00005157 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save Device ID
 31368 00005158 88EC                    	MOV	AH,CH		; Device ID to AH
 31369 0000515A E83201                  	CALL	DOOPEN		; Fill in SFT for share check
 31370 0000515D C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31371 00005161 56                      	push	si
 31372 00005162 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 31373 00005163 E8622F                  	call	ShareEnter
 31374 00005166 734E                    	jnc	short MakeEndShare
 31375                                  
 31376                                  ; User failed request.
 31377 00005168 5B                      	pop	bx
 31378 00005169 5E                      	pop	si
 31379 0000516A 59                      	pop	cx
 31380 0000516B 58                      	pop	ax
 31381                                  
 31382                                  Make_Share_ret:
 31383 0000516C B006                    	MOV	AL,6
 31384 0000516E EB98                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31385                                  
 31386                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 31387 00005170 59                      	POP	CX		; Get back device ID
 31388                                  make_err_ret_5:
 31389 00005171 B005                    	MOV     AL,5		; Attribute mismatch
 31390                                          ; 22/11/2022
 31391 00005173 EB93                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31392                                  
 31393                                  make_exists_dir:
 31394 00005175 B001                    	MOV	AL,1		; exists as directory, always an error

 31398                                  make_save:

 31414                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them

 31423                                  
 31424                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 31425                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 31426                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 31427

 31452                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31453                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 31454                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 31455 000051B0 E84515                  	call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 31456 000051B3 58                      	POP	AX
 31457 000051B4 EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 31458                                  
 31459                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 31460                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 31461                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 31462                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 31463                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 31464                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 31465                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 31466                                  ;
 31467                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 31468                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 31469                                  
 31470                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31471                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31472                                  
 31473                                  MakeEndShare:
 31474 000051B6 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT

 31480 000051C3 57                      	push	di

 31484 000051C9 9D                      	POPF

 31486 000051CB 5F                      	pop	di

 31488                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 31489 000051CF E8F3C6                  	call	LCritSFT
 31490                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31491                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31492 000051D2 5B                      	pop	bx
 31493 000051D3 5E                      	pop	si
 31494 000051D4 59                      	pop	cx
 31495 000051D5 58                      	pop	ax
 31496 000051D6 E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save
 31497                                  
 31498                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 31499                                  
 31500 000051D9 72A9                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 31501 000051DB 50                      	push	ax
 31502 000051DC 53                      	push	bx
 31503 000051DD 56                      	push	si

 31505 000051DF E8E62E                  	call	ShareEnter

 31509 000051E5 58                      	pop	ax

 31514 000051E6 C3                      	retn

 31516                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31517                                  ;
 31518                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 31519                                  ;
 31520                                  ; Inputs:
 31521                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 31522                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 31523                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31524                                  ;		  entries
 31525                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 31526                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 31527                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31528                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 31529                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 31530                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 31531                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31532                                  ;	  If FILE
 31533                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31534                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31535                                  ;	  If device
 31536                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31537                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31538                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31539                                  ; Function:
 31540                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 31541                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 31542                                  ; Outputs:
 31543                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 31544                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 31545                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 31546                                  ;	  else
 31547                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 31548                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 31549                                  ;
 31550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31551                                  
 31552                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31553                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31554                                  
 31555                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31556                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31557                                  
 31558                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 31559                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 31560                                  
 31561                                  NEWENTRY:

 31703                                  ; DOOPEN
 31704                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31705                                  ;
 31706                                  ; Inputs:
 31707                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31708                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31709                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31710                                  ;	  If FILE
 31711                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31712                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31713                                  ;	  If device
 31714                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31715                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31716                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31717                                  ; Function:
 31718                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31719                                  ; Outputs:
 31720                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 31721                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31722                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 31723                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31724                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31725                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31726                                  ;	  sf_position = 0

 31728                                  ;	  sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 31729                                  ;	  sf_size = 0
 31730                                  ;	  If file
 31731                                  ;	  sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 31732                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 31733                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0
 31734                                  ;	  sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 31735                                  ;	  sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 31736                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed

 32005                                  ;
 32006                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 32007                                  ;
 32008                                  ; Inputs:
 32009                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB
 32010                                  ;	  [CURBUF] Set
 32011                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 32012                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 32013                                  ; Function:
 32014                                  ;	  Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 32015                                  ; Outputs:
 32016                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32017                                  ;	  (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 32018                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 32019                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32020                                  
 32021                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 32114                                  
 32115                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32116                                  ;
 32117                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32118                                  ;
 32119                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32120                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32121                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32122                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32123                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32124                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32125                                  ;
 32126                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32127                                  
 32128                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32129                                  	PUSH	AX
 32130                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32131                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32132                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32133                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32134                                  	push	es
 32135                                  	push	di
 32136                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32137                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32138                                  	pop	di
 32139                                  	pop	es
 32140                                  
 32141                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32142                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32143                                  	POP	AX
 32144                                  	retn
 32145                                  
 32146                                  %endif

 32183                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 32184                                  ;
 32185                                  ; Inputs:

 32188                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT

 32191                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)

 32400                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 32401                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32402                                  ;
 32403                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 32404                                  ;
 32405                                  ; Inputs:
 32406                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 32407                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 32408                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32409                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 32410                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 32411                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 32412                                  ; Function:
 32413                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 32414                                  ;       read if necessary.
 32415                                  ; Outputs:
 32416                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 32417                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 32418                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 32419                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32420                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 32421                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 32422                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32423                                  
 32424                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32425                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:98C2h
 32426                                  
 32427                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8BF1h) - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1)
 32428                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8C2Ch) - Retro DOS v4.2
 32429                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0BE33h)
 32430                                  
 32431                                  BUFSEC:
 32432                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32433                                  	;;;
 32434                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32435 00005455 8B16[DE0A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 32436                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx
 32437 00005459 8716[E80A]              	xchg	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32438 0000545D 52                      	push	dx	; [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32439                                  	;;;
 32440 0000545E 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 32441 00005462 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 32442                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 32443 00005466 C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 32444 0000546B E89A01                          CALL    FIGREC
 32445 0000546E E81F11                  	call	GETBUFFR
 32446                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32447                                  	;;;
 32448 00005471 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32449                                  	;;;
 32450 00005475 72DD                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 32451                                  
 32452 00005477 C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 32453 0000547C 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 32454 00005480 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 32455 00005482 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 32456 00005486 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 32457 00005488 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 32458 0000548C C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 32459                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 32460 00005490 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 32461                                  	;;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 32462                                  	;;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 32463                                          ;lea	di,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1  ; 25/02/2024
 32464 00005495 8D7D18                  	LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 32465 00005498 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 32466 0000549C F8                              CLC	; (not necessary!?) ; 25/02/2024
 32467 0000549D C3                              retn
 32468                                  
 32469                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 32470                                  
 32471                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32472                                  ;
 32473                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 32474                                  ;
 32475                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 32476                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32477                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32478                                  ;
 32479                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 32480                                  ;
 32481                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32482                                  
 32483                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32484                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32485                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32486                                  BUFRD:
 32487 0000549E 06                              PUSH	ES
 32488 0000549F 31C0                            xor	ax,ax			; pre-read sector

 32499 000054AF 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX

 32512

 32540                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.

 32543                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.

 32745                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 32746                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32747                                  ;
 32748                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 32749                                  ;
 32750                                  ; Inputs:
 32751                                  ;	  BX = Physical cluster
 32752                                  ;	  CX = No. of records
 32753                                  ;	  DL = sector within cluster
 32754                                  ;	  ES:BP = Base of drive parameters

 32757                                  ;	  AX = No. of records remaining

 32770                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 32785 00005589 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX

 32791                                  ; AL has number of sectors available in current cluster

 33017                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33018                                  ; DOSCODE:8DC2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 33019                                  
 33020                                  ; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 33021                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset
 33022                                  
 33023                                  ;Break   <ALLOCATE -- Assign disk space>
 33024                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33025                                  ;
 33026                                  ; Procedure Name : ALLOCATE - Allocate Disk Space
 33027                                  ;
 33028                                  ;   ALLOCATE is called to allocate disk clusters. The new clusters are
 33029                                  ;   FAT-chained onto the end of the existing file.
 33030                                  ;
 33031                                  ;   The DPB contains the cluster # of the last free cluster allocated
 33032                                  ;   (dpb_next_free). We start at this cluster and scan towards higher
 33033                                  ;   numbered clusters, looking for the necessary free blocks.
 33034                                  ;
 33035                                  ;   Once again, fancy terminology gets in the way of correct coding. When
 33036                                  ;   using next_free, start scanning AT THAT POINT and not the one following it.
 33037                                  ;   This fixes the boundary condition bug when only free = next_free = 2.
 33038                                  ;
 33039                                  ;       If we get to the end of the disk without satisfaction:
 33040                                  ;
 33041                                  ;           if (dpb_next_free == 2) then we've scanned the whole disk.
 33042                                  ;               return (insufficient_disk_space)
 33043                                  ;           ELSE
 33044                                  ;               dpb_next_free = 2; start scan over from the beginning.
 33045                                  ;
 33046                                  ;   Note that there is no multitasking interlock. There is no race when
 33047                                  ;   examining the entrys in an in-core FAT block since there will be no
 33048                                  ;   context switch. When UNPACK context switches while waiting for a FAT read
 33049                                  ;   we are done with any in-core FAT blocks, so again there is no race. The
 33050                                  ;   only special concern is that V2 and V3 MSDOS left the last allocated
 33051                                  ;   cluster as "00"; marking it EOF only when the entire alloc request was
 33052                                  ;   satisfied. We can't allow another activation to think this cluster is
 33053                                  ;   free, so we give it a special temporary mark to show that it is, indeed,
 33054                                  ;   allocated.
 33055                                  ;
 33056                                  ;   Note that when we run out of space this algorithem will scan from
 33057                                  ;   dpb_next_free to the end, then scan from cluster 2 through the end,
 33058                                  ;   redundantly scanning the later part of the disk. This only happens when
 33059                                  ;   we run out of space, so sue me.
 33060                                  ;
 33061                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33062                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33063                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33064                                  ;   The use of FATBYT and RESTFATBYT is somewhat mysterious. Here is the
 33065                                  ;   explanation:
 33066                                  ;
 33067                                  ;   In the NUL file case (sf_firclus currently 0) ALLOCATE is called with
 33068                                  ;   entry BX = 0. What needs to be done in this case is to stuff the cluster
 33069                                  ;   number of the first cluster allocated in sf_firclus when the ALLOCATE is
 33070                                  ;   complete. THIS VALUE IS SAVED TEMPORARILY IN CLUSTER 0, HENCE THE CURRENT
 33071                                  ;   VALUE IN CLUSTER 0 MUST BE SAVED AND RESTORED. This is a side effect of
 33072                                  ;   the fact that PACK and UNPACK don't treat requests for clusters 0 and 1 as
 33073                                  ;   errors. This "stuff" is done by the call to PACK which is right before
 33074                                  ;   the
 33075                                  ;           LOOP   findfre         ; alloc more if needed
 33076                                  ;   instruction when the first cluster is allocated to the nul file. The
 33077                                  ;   value is recalled from cluster 0 and stored at sf_firclus at ads4:
 33078                                  ;
 33079                                  ;   This method is obviously useless (because it is non-reentrant) for
 33080                                  ;   multitasking, and will have to be changed. Storing the required value on
 33081                                  ;   the stack is recommended. Setting sf_firclus at the PACK of cluster 0
 33082                                  ;   (instead of actually doing the PACK) is BAD because it doesn't handle
 33083                                  ;   problems with INT 24 well.
 33084                                  ;
 33085                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33086                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33087                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33088                                  ;       ENTRY   BX = Last cluster of file (0 if null file)
 33089                                  ;               CX = No. of clusters to allocate
 33090                                  ;               ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33091                                  ;               [THISSFT] = Points to SFT
 33092                                  ;
 33093                                  ;       EXIT   'C' set if insufficient space
 33094                                  ;                [FAILERR] can be tested to see the reason for failure
 33095                                  ;                CX = max. no. of clusters that could be added to file
 33096                                  ;              'C' clear if space allocated
 33097                                  ;                BX = First cluster allocated
 33098                                  ;                FAT is fully updated
 33099                                  ;                sf_FIRCLUS field of SFT set if file was null
 33100                                  ;
 33101                                  ;       USES    ALL but SI, BP
 33102                                  
 33103                                  ;callmagic  proc near
 33104                                  ;       push    ds                             ;push segment of routine 
 33105                                  ;       push    Offset MagicPatch              ;push offset for routine
 33106                                  ;       retf                                   ;simulate jmp far
 33107                                  ;                                              ;far return address is on
 33108                                  ;                                              ;stack, so far return from
 33109                                  ;                                              ;call will return this routine
 33110                                  ;callmagic  endp
 33111                                  
 33112                                  ; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33113                                  ;PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9AC5h
 33114                                  
 33115                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC2h)
 33116                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C078h)
 33117                                  
 33118                                  ; 07/03/2025
 33119                                  ; 25/09/2023
 33120                                  %if 0	; 27/02/2024
 33121                                  callmagic:
 33122                                  	push	ds
 33123                                  	push	word [ss:OffsetMagicPatch]
 33124                                  	retf	
 33125                                  %endif
 33126                                  
 33127                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33128                                  %if 1
 33129                                  ALLOCATE_X:
 33130 00005640 A3[F00A]                	mov	[CCOUNT_HW],ax
 33131                                  	;jmp	short ALLOCATE
 33132                                  %endif
 33133                                  
 33134                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33135                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9ACFh
 33136                                  
 33137                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC9h)
 33138                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C07Fh)
 33139                                  
 33140                                  ALLOCATE:
 33141                                  	; 10/09/2018

 33143                                  ;

 33147                                  ;the disk compression software to fail allocations if the
 33148                                  ;FAT would allows allocation, but the free space for compressed
 33149                                  ;data would not.
 33150                                  ;        
 33151                                  ;;;	call    far ptr MAGICPATCH
 33152                                  ;;; We cannot do a far call since we cannot have fix-ups[romdos,hidos],
 33153                                  ;;; but we do know the segment and offset of the routine
 33154                                  ;;; so simulate a far call to dosdata:magicpatch

 33158                                          ;clc				;clear carry so we fall through
 33159                                  	;				;if no patch is present
 33160                                  	;push	cs			;push segment for far return
 33161                                          ;call	callmagic		;this is a near call
 33162                                          ;jnc	short Regular_Allocate_Path
 33163                                  	;jmp	Disk_Full_Return
 33164                                  
 33165                                  ; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33166                                  ; DOSCODE:9ACFh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 33167

 33174                                  	jnc	short Regular_Allocate_Path

 33180                                  ;END MAGICDRV MODIFICATIONS

 33184

 33231                                  %else
 33232                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0

 33234                                  	;;;
 33235 00005664 FF36[F00A]              	push	word [CCOUNT_HW]
 33236 00005668 51                      	push	cx

 33238 0000566D 53                      	push	bx
 33239

 33241                                  
 33242 00005670 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0

 33244 00005672 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0

 33248 0000567E 268B5E1D                	mov	bx,[es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE]

 33250

 33259                                  ads1:

 33261 00005697 7721                    	ja	short FINDFRE
 33262                                  ads2:
 33263 00005699 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33264                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],bx
 33265 0000569B 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0
 33266 0000569F 750A                    	jnz	short ads3		; not FAT32
 33267

 33269 000056A1 26C746390200            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE],2

 33271 000056A7 26895E3B                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE+2],bx ; 0
 33272                                  ads3:
 33273 000056AB 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx ; 0
 33274                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Dh],2	
 33275 000056AF 26C7461D0200            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE],2
 33276 000056B5 43                      	inc	bx ; 1
 33277                                  	;or	[es:bp+18h],bl
 33278 000056B6 26085E18                	or	[es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],bl ; 1	
 33279                                  	;;;
 33280                                  %endif
 33281                                  
 33282                                  ;   Scanning both forwards and backwards for a free cluster
 33283                                  ;
 33284                                  ;       (BX) = forwards scan pointer
 33285                                  ;       (CX) = clusters remaining to be allocated
 33286                                  ;       (DX) = current last cluster in file
 33287                                  ;       (TOS) = last cluster of file
 33288                                  
 33289                                  FINDFRE:
 33290                                  %if 0
 33291                                          INC     BX
 33292                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 33293                                          CMP	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 33294                                  	ja	short ads7	; at end of disk
 33295                                          call	UNPACK          ; check out this cluster
 33296                                          jc	short ads4	; FAT error             [INTERR?]
 33297                                          jnz	short FINDFRE	; not free, keep on truckin
 33298
