 33738                                  ;
 33739                                  ; Procedure Name : RELEASE
 33740                                  ;
 33741                                  ; Inputs:
 33742                                  ;       BX = Cluster in file
 33743                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33744                                  ; Function:
 33745                                  ;       Frees cluster chain starting with [BX]
 33746                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)

 33749                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33750                                  
 33751                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33752                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D13h
 33753                                  
 33754                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8E86h)
 33755                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C27Fh)

 33758                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33759                                  RELEASE:
 33760 00005830 31D2                            XOR     DX,DX
 33761                                  	
 33762                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33763                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33764                                  	;;;
 33765 00005832 8916[EA0A]              	mov	[CLUSDATA_HW],dx ; (dx = 0, release)
 33766                                  	;;;
 33767                                  
 33768                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D19h
 33769                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8E88h)
 33770                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C285h)
 33771                                  
 33772                                  	;entry	RELBLKS
 33773                                  RELBLKS:
 33774                                  
 33775                                  ;   Enter here with DX=0FFFFH to put an end-of-file mark in the first cluster
 33776                                  ;   and free the rest in the chain.
 33777                                  
 33778 00005836 E80807                  	call	UNPACK
 33779                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 33780                                  	;jz	short RELEASE_flush
 33781                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33782 00005839 7652                            jbe	short RET12 ; jna short RET12
 33783                                  				; CCONTENT_HW:DI= Content of FAT
 33784                                   				; for given cluster (next cluster)
 33785 0000583B 89F8                    	MOV     AX,DI
 33786 0000583D 52                              PUSH    DX
 33787                                  
 33788                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33789                                  	;push	ax
 33790                                  	;;;
 33791                                  
 33792 0000583E E8AF07                  	call	PACK
 33793                                  
 33794                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33795                                  	;pop	ax
 33796 00005841 8B16[EC0A]              	mov	dx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 33797 00005845 8916[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx ; next cluster (hw) to be released
 33798 00005849 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax		 ; next cluster (lw) to be released
 33799                                  	;;;
 33800                                          
 33801 0000584B 5A                      	POP     DX
 33802                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 33803                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33804 0000584C 723F                    	jc	short RET12
 33805                                          
 33806 0000584E 09D2                    	OR      DX,DX
 33807 00005850 751F                            JNZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; Was putting EOF mark
 33808                                  
 33809                                  ; 28/02/2024
 33810                                  %if 0
 33811                                  	;;cmp	word [es:bp+1Eh],-1 ; MSDOS 3.3
 33812                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],-1 ; MSDOS 6.0
 33813                                  	CMP     word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],-1 ; Free count valid?
 33814                                          JZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; No
 33815                                          INC	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 33816                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 33817                                          MOV     BX,AX
 33818                                          dec     ax              	; check for "1"
 33819                                  	jz	short RELEASE_flush	; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 33820                                  %else
 33821                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33822                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33823                                  	;;;
 33824 00005852 3B16[EA0A]              	cmp	dx,[CLUSDATA_HW]	; > 0 ? (delete, release)
 33825 00005856 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC	; no, EOF (allocate, -1), (dx = 0)
 33826                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],0FFFFh
 33827 00005858 26837E1FFF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],0FFFFh ; -1
 33828                                  					; Free count valid?
 33829 0000585D 7412                    	jz	short NO_DEALLOC	; No (dx = 0)
 33830                                  relblks_ifc:
 33831                                  	;inc	word ptr es:[bp+1Fh]
 33832 0000585F 26FF461F                	inc	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 33833 00005863 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2
 33834                                  
 33835                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 33836 00005865 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx
 33837 00005869 7513                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2	; not FAT32
 33838                                  
 33839                                  	;inc	word [es:bp+21h]
 33840 0000586B 26FF4621                	inc	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2]
 33841 0000586F EB0D                    	jmp	short NO_DEALLOC2
 33842                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 33843                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 33844 00005871 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx	; dx is -1 or 0
 33845                                  					; (valid 16 bit fat size is another number)
 33846 00005875 7507                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2 ; FAT (FAT16 or FAT12)
 33847                                  					; dx = 0, FAT32
 33848                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+21h],0FFFFh
 33849 00005877 26837E21FF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2],0FFFFh
 33850 0000587C 75E1                    	jnz	short relblks_ifc
 33851                                  NO_DEALLOC2:
 33852 0000587E 833E[E80A]00            	cmp	word [CLUSTNUM_HW],0
 33853 00005883 7503                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC3
 33854 00005885 48                      	dec	ax			; check for "1"	
 33855 00005886 7405                    	jz	short RET12		; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 33856                                  NO_DEALLOC3:
 33857                                  	;;;
 33858                                  %endif
 33859                                  
 33860 00005888 E88D06                  	call	IsEOF
 33861 0000588B 72A3                            JB	short RELEASE	; Carry clear if JMP not taken
 33862                                  
 33863                                  	; 16/12/2022
 33864                                  ; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 33865                                  ; 28/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33866                                  %if 0
 33867                                  RELEASE_flush:
 33868                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 33869                                  	mov	al,[es:bp]
 33870                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 33871                                  	push	si		; FLUSHBUF may trash these and we guarantee
 33872                                  	push	cx		;  them to be preserved.
 33873                                  	push	es
 33874                                  	push	bp
 33875                                  	call	FLUSHBUF	; commit buffers for this drive
 33876                                  	pop	bp
 33877                                  	pop	es
 33878                                  	pop	cx
 33879                                  	pop	si
 33880                                  %endif		; 28/02/2024
 33881                                  
 33882                                  RET12:
 33883 0000588D C3                      	retn
 33884                                  
 33885                                  ;Break	<GETEOF -- Find the end of a file>
 33886                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33887                                  ;
 33888                                  ; Procedure Name : GETEOF
 33889                                  ;
 33890                                  ; Inputs:
 33891                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 33892                                  ;       BX = Cluster in a file
 33893                                  ;       DS = CS
 33894                                  ; Outputs:
 33895                                  ;       BX = Last cluster in the file
 33896                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 33897                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 33898                                  ;
 33899                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33900                                  
 33901                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33902                                  %if 0
 33903                                  GETEOF:
 33904                                  	call	UNPACK
 33905                                          jc	short RET12
 33906                                          PUSH    BX
 33907                                          MOV     BX,DI
 33908                                  	call	IsEOF
 33909                                          POP     BX
 33910                                          JAE     short RET12
 33911                                          MOV     BX,DI
 33912                                          JMP     short GETEOF
 33913                                  %else
 33914                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33915                                  	;;;
 33916                                  GETEOF4:	; **
 33917 0000588E 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33918                                  GETEOF1:
 33919 00005892 89C7                    	mov	di,ax
 33920 00005894 8916[F20A]              	mov	[CLUSTERS_HW],dx ; CLUSTERS_HW:DI = Cluster Count
 33921 00005898 58                      	pop	ax
 33922 00005899 5A                      	pop	dx
 33923 0000589A C3                      	retn
 33924                                  
 33925                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D7Ch
 33926                                  GETEOF:
 33927 0000589B 52                      	push	dx
 33928 0000589C 50                      	push	ax
 33929 0000589D 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx ; 0	; cluster count = 0
 33930 0000589F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33931                                  GETEOF2:
 33932 000058A1 E89D06                  	call	UNPACK
 33933 000058A4 72EC                    	jc	short GETEOF1
 33934                                  		; CCONTENT_HW:DI = next cluster (cluster content)
 33935 000058A6 40                      	inc	ax
 33936 000058A7 7501                    	jnz	short GETEOF3
 33937 000058A9 42                      	inc	dx
 33938                                  GETEOF3:
 33939 000058AA FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33940 000058AE 53                      	push    bx
 33941                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33942 000058AF 8B1E[EC0A]              	mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 33943 000058B3 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 33944 000058B7 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 33945 000058B9 E85C06                  	call	IsEOF
 33946                                  	;pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33947 000058BC 5B                      	pop	bx
 33948                                  	;jae	short GETEOF1   ; EOF
 33949 000058BD 73CF                    	jae	short GETEOF4 ; ** ; 28/02/2024
 33950                                  	;mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW] ; not EOF
 33951                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 33952 000058BF 5B                      	pop	bx	; * ; 28/02/2024
 33953 000058C0 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 33954 000058C2 EBDD                    	jmp	short GETEOF2   ; get next cluster
 33955                                  	;;;
 33956                                  %endif

 33996                                  ;
 33997                                  ; Procedure : MakeFcb
 33998                                  ;
 33999                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34000                                  
 34001                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34002                                  	; DOSCODE:8E77h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34003                                  
 34004                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34005                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9DB0h
 34006                                  
 34007                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8ED3h)
 34008                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8D92h)
 34009                                  
 34010                                  MAKEFCB:
 34011                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34012                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0
 34013 000058C4 30D2                    	XOR	DL,DL		; Flag--not ambiguous file name
 34014                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34015 000058C6 368816[4E03]            	mov	[ss:SpaceFlag],dl ; 0
 34016                                  	;test	al,2
 34017 000058CB A802                    	test	AL,DRVBIT	; Use current drive field if default?
 34018 000058CD 7503                    	JNZ	short DEFDRV
 34019                                  	;MOV	BYTE [ES:DI],0	; No - use default drive
 34020                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34021 000058CF 268815                  	mov	[es:di],dl ; 0
 34022                                  DEFDRV:
 34023 000058D2 47                      	INC	DI
 34024 000058D3 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34025                                  	;test	al,4
 34026 000058D6 A804                    	test	AL,NAMBIT	; Use current name fields as default?
 34027 000058D8 93                      	XCHG	AX,BX		; Save bits in BX
 34028 000058D9 B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34029 000058DB 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB	; If not, go fill with blanks
 34030 000058DD 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34031 000058DF 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX		; Don't fill any
 34032                                  FILLB:
 34033 000058E1 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34034 000058E3 B103                    	MOV	CL,3
 34035 000058E5 F6C308                  	test	BL,EXTBIT	; Use current extension as default
 34036 000058E8 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB2
 34037 000058EA 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34038 000058EC 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX
 34039                                  FILLB2:
 34040 000058EE F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34041 000058F0 91                      	XCHG	AX,CX		; Put zero in AX
 34042 000058F1 AB                      	STOSW
 34043 000058F2 AB                      	STOSW			; Initialize two words after to zero
 34044 000058F3 83EF10                  	SUB	DI,16		; Point back at start
 34045                                  	;test	bl,1
 34046 000058F6 F6C301                  	test	BL,SCANSEPARATOR; Scan off separators if not zero
 34047 000058F9 7409                    	JZ	short SKPSPC
 34048 000058FB E88800                  	CALL	SCANB		; Peel off blanks and tabs
 34049 000058FE E81E01                  	CALL	DELIM		; Is it a one-time-only delimiter?
 34050 00005901 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSCAN
 34051 00005903 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over the delimiter
 34052                                  SKPSPC:
 34053 00005904 E87F00                  	CALL	SCANB		; Always kill preceding blanks and tabs
 34054                                  NOSCAN:
 34055 00005907 E8EC00                  	CALL	GETLET
 34056 0000590A 761E                    	JBE	short NODRV	; Quit if termination character
 34057 0000590C 803C3A                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],":"	; Check for potential drive specifier
 34058 0000590F 7519                    	JNZ	short NODRV
 34059 00005911 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over colon
 34060 00005912 2C40                    	SUB	AL,"@"          ; Convert drive letter to drive number (A=1)
 34061 00005914 760F                    	JBE	short BADDRV	; Drive letter out of range
 34062                                  
 34063 00005916 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34064 00005917 E8961E                  	call	GetVisDrv
 34065 0000591A 58                      	POP	AX
 34066 0000591B 730A                    	JNC	short HAVDRV
 34067                                  
 34068                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34069                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34070                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34071 0000591D 36803E[1006]1A          	CMP	byte [SS:DrvErr],error_not_DOS_disk ; 1Ah
 34072                                  					; if not FAT drive ;AN000;
 34073 00005923 7402                    	JZ	short HAVDRV		; assume ok	   ;AN000;
 34074                                  BADDRV:
 34075 00005925 B2FF                    	MOV	DL,-1
 34076                                  HAVDRV:
 34077 00005927 AA                      	STOSB			; Put drive specifier in first byte
 34078 00005928 46                      	INC	SI
 34079 00005929 4F                      	DEC	DI		; Counteract next two instructions
 34080                                  NODRV:
 34081 0000592A 4E                      	DEC	SI		; Back up
 34082 0000592B 47                      	INC	DI		; Skip drive byte
 34083                                  
 34084                                  	;entry	NORMSCAN
 34085                                  NORMSCAN:
 34086 0000592C B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34087 0000592F E82200                  	CALL	GETWORD 	; Get 8-letter file name
 34088 00005932 803C2E                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],"."
 34089 00005935 7510                    	JNZ	short NODOT
 34090 00005937 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over dot if present
 34091                                  
 34092                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34093                                  	;mov	cx,3
 34094 00005938 B103                    	mov	cl,3	; ch=0
 34095                                  
 34096                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34097                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34098                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID2 ; 100h ;AN000;
 34099                                  	; 10/06/2019
 34100 0000593A 36F606[1206]01          	test	byte [SS:DOS34_FLAG+1],(DBCS_VOLID2>>8) ; 1
 34101 00005940 7402                    	JZ	short VOLOK				;AN000;
 34102 00005942 A4                      	MOVSB			; 2nd byte of DBCS	;AN000;
 34103                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34104                                  	;MOV	CX,2					;AN000;
 34105 00005943 49                      	dec	cx  ; cx=2
 34106                                  	;JMP	SHORT contvol				;AN000;
 34107                                  VOLOK:
 34108                                  	;MOV	CX,3		; Get 3-letter extension
 34109                                  contvol:
 34110 00005944 E81300                  	CALL	MUSTGETWORD
 34111                                  NODOT:
 34112 00005947 88D0                    	MOV	AL,DL
 34113                                  
 34114                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34115                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],0FEFFh
 34116                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34117 00005949 368026[1206]FE          	and	byte [ss:DOS34_FLAG+1],0FEh ; (~DBCS_VOLID2)>>8
 34118                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],~DBCS_VOLID2 ; ### BUG FIX ###
 34119                                  
 34120 0000594F C3                      	retn
 34121                                  
 34122                                  NONAM:
 34123 00005950 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34124 00005952 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34125 00005953 C3                      	retn
 34126                                  
 34127                                  GETWORD:
 34128 00005954 E89F00                  	CALL	GETLET		
 34129 00005957 76F7                    	JBE	short NONAM	; Exit if invalid character
 34130 00005959 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34131                                  
 34132                                  ;	UGH!!! Horrible bug here that should be fixed at some point:
 34133                                  ;	If the name we are scanning is longer than CX, we keep on reading!
 34134                                  
 34135                                  MUSTGETWORD:
 34136 0000595A E89900                  	CALL	GETLET
 34137                                  
 34138                                  ;	If spaceFlag is set then we allow spaces in a pathname
 34139                                  
 34140                                  ;IF NOT TABLELOOK
 34141                                  ;	JB	short FILLNAM  ; MSDOS 3.3
 34142                                  ;ENDIF
 34143 0000595D 750C                    	JNZ	short MustCheckCX
 34144                                  
 34145                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34146 0000595F 36F606[4E03]FF          	test	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0FFh
 34147 00005965 7419                    	JZ	short FILLNAM
 34148 00005967 3C20                    	CMP	AL," "
 34149 00005969 7515                    	JNZ	short FILLNAM
 34150                                  
 34151                                  MustCheckCX:
 34152 0000596B E3ED                    	JCXZ	MUSTGETWORD
 34153 0000596D 49                      	DEC	CX
 34154 0000596E 3C2A                    	CMP	AL,"*"          ; Check for ambiguous file specifier
 34155 00005970 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSTAR
 34156 00005972 B03F                    	MOV	AL,"?"
 34157 00005974 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34158                                  NOSTAR:
 34159 00005976 AA                      	STOSB
 34160 00005977 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?"
 34161 00005979 75DF                    	JNZ	short MUSTGETWORD
 34162 0000597B 80CA01                  	OR	DL,1		; Flag ambiguous file name
 34163 0000597E EBDA                    	JMP	short MUSTGETWORD
 34164                                  FILLNAM:
 34165 00005980 B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34166 00005982 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34167 00005984 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34168 00005985 C3                      	retn
 34169                                  
 34170                                  SCANB:
 34171 00005986 AC                      	LODSB
 34172 00005987 E89D00                  	CALL	SPCHK
 34173 0000598A 74FA                    	JZ	short SCANB
 34174 0000598C 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34175                                  scanb_retn:
 34176 0000598D C3                      	retn
 34177                                  
 34178                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34179                                  ;
 34180                                  ; Procedure Name : NameTrans
 34181                                  ;
 34182                                  ; NameTrans is used by FindPath to scan off an element of a path. We must
 34183                                  ; allow spaces in pathnames
 34184                                  ;
 34185                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI points to start of path element
 34186                                  ;   Outputs:	Name1 has unpacked name, uppercased
 34187                                  ;		ES = DOSGroup
 34188                                  ;		DS:SI advanced after name
 34189                                  ;   Registers modified: DI,AX,DX,CX
 34190                                  ;
 34191                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34192                                  
 34193                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34194                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34195                                  
 34196                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34197                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9E7Ch
 34198                                  
 34199                                  NameTrans:
 34200                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34201 0000598E 36C606[4E03]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],1
 34202 00005994 16                      	push	ss
 34203 00005995 07                      	pop	es
 34204                                  
 34205                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 34206 00005996 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 34207 00005999 57                      	PUSH	DI
 34208                                  
 34209                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34210                                  %if 0
 34211                                  	MOV	AX,'  '	; 2020h
 34212                                  	MOV	CX,5
 34213                                  	STOSB
 34214                                  	REP	STOSW		; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34215                                  	XOR	AL,AL		; Set stuff for NORMSCAN
 34216                                  	MOV	DL,AL
 34217                                  %else
 34218                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34219                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34220                                  	;;;
 34221 0000599A B020                    	mov     al, 20h ; ' '
 34222 0000599C B90B00                  	mov     cx, 11
 34223 0000599F F3AA                    	rep stosb               ; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34224 000059A1 91                      	xchg    ax, cx
 34225 000059A2 99                      	cwd
 34226                                  	;;;
 34227                                  %endif
 34228                                  
 34229 000059A3 AA                      	STOSB
 34230 000059A4 5F                      	POP	DI
 34231                                  
 34232 000059A5 E884FF                  	CALL	NORMSCAN
 34233                                  
 34234                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 34235 000059A8 36803E[4B05]E5          	CMP	byte [SS:NAME1],0E5H
 34236 000059AE 75DD                    	jnz	short scanb_retn
 34237 000059B0 36C606[4B05]05          	MOV	byte [SS:NAME1],5 ; Magic name translation
 34238 000059B6 C3                      	retn
 34239                                  
 34240                                  ;Break	<GETLET, DELIM -- CHECK CHARACTERS AND CONVERT>
 34241                                  ;============================================================================
 34242                                  
 34243                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34244                                  ; DOSCODE:8FD2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34245                                  
 34246                                  ;If TableLook
 34247                                  
 34248                                  ;hkn; Table	SEGMENT
 34249                                  ;	PUBLIC	CharType
 34250                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34251                                  
 34252                                  ; Character type table for file name scanning
 34253                                  ; Table provides a mapping of characters to validity bits.
 34254                                  ; Four bits are provided for each character. Values 7Dh and above
 34255                                  ; have all bits set, so that part of the table is chopped off, and
 34256                                  ; the translation routine is responsible for screening these values.
 34257                                  ; The bit values are defined in DOSSYM.INC
 34258                                  
 34259                                  ;	      ; ^A and NUL
 34260                                  ;CharType:
 34261                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34262                                  ;	      ; ^C and ^B
 34263                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34264                                  ;	      ; ^E and ^D
 34265                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34266                                  ;	      ; ^G and ^F
 34267                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34268                                  ;	      ; TAB and BS
 34269                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34270                                  ;	      ; ^K and ^J
 34271                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34272                                  ;	      ; ^M and ^L
 34273                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34274                                  ;	      ; ^O and ^N
 34275                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34276                                  ;	      ; ^Q and ^P
 34277                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34278                                  ;	      ; ^S and ^R
 34279                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34280                                  ;	      ; ^U and ^T
 34281                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34282                                  ;	      ; ^W and ^V
 34283                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34284                                  ;	      ; ^Y and ^X
 34285                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34286                                  ;	      ; ESC and ^Z
 34287                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34288                                  ;	      ; ^] and ^;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34290                                  ;	      ; ^_ and ^^
 34291                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34292                                  ;	      ; ! and SPACE
 34293                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK)
 34294                                  ;	      ; # and "
 34295                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK)
 34296                                  ;	      ; $ - )
 34297                                  ;	 db   3 dup (0FFh)
 34298                                  ;	      ; + and *
 34299                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34300                                  ;	      ; - and '
 34301                                  ;	 db   NOT (FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM)
 34302                                  ;	      ; / and .
 34303                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34304                                  ;	      ; 0 - 9
 34305                                  ;	 db   5 dup (0FFh)
 34306                                  ;	      ; ; and :
 34307                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34308                                  ;	      ; = and <
 34309                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34310                                  ;	      ; ? and >
 34311                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34312                                  ;	      ; A - Z
 34313                                  ;	 db   13 dup (0FFh)
 34314                                  ;	      ; \ and [
 34315                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34316                                  ;	      ; ^ and ]
 34317                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34318                                  ;	      ; _ - {
 34319                                  ;	 db   15 dup (0FFh)
 34320                                  ;	      ; } and |
 34321                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34322                                  
 34323                                  ;CharType_last equ ($ - CharType) * 2	; This is the value of the last
 34324                                  ;					; character in the table

 34329                                  ;FFCB	equ 8		; is valid in an FCB

 34336 000059B7 6666666606666666                db  66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 06h, 66h, 66h, 66h ; 0-7

 34343 000059EF FFFFFFFFFFFFF4          	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0F4h	   ; 56-62

 34387                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34388                                  ; DOSCODE:9011h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34389                                  
 34390                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34391                                  ; DOSCODE:8FB5h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34392                                  
 34393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34394                                  ;
 34395                                  ; Procedure Names : GetLet, UCase, GetLet3
 34396                                  ;
 34397                                  ; These routines take a character, convert it to upper case, and check
 34398                                  ; for delimiters.  Three different entry points:
 34399                                  ;	GetLet -  DS:[SI] = character to convert
 34400                                  ;	UCase  -  AL = character to convert
 34401                                  ;	GetLet3 - AL = character
 34402                                  ;		  [BX] = translation table to use
 34403                                  ;
 34404                                  ;	Exit (in all cases) : AL = upper case character
 34405                                  ;			      CY set if char is control char other than TAB
 34406                                  ;			      ZF set if char is a delimiter
 34407                                  ;	Uses : AX, flags
 34408                                  ;
 34409                                  ; NOTE: This routine exists in a fast table lookup version, and a slow
 34410                                  ; inline version.  Return with carry set is only possible in the inline
 34411                                  ; version. The table lookup version is the one in use.
 34412                                  ;
 34413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34414                                  
 34415                                  ; This entry point has character at [SI]
 34416                                  
 34417                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5517h
 34418                                  GETLET:	
 34419 000059F6 AC                      	LODSB
 34420                                  
 34421                                  ; This entry point has character in AL
 34422                                  
 34423                                  	;entry	UCase
 34424                                  UCase:	
 34425                                  	; 09/08/2018
 34426                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5518h
 34427                                  _UCase:
 34428 000059F7 53                      	PUSH	BX
 34429 000059F8 BB[7E0B]                	MOV	BX,FILE_UCASE_TAB+2
 34430                                  
 34431                                  ; Convert the character in AL to upper case
 34432                                  
 34433                                  gl_0:
 34434 000059FB 3C61                    	CMP	AL,"a"
 34435 000059FD 7214                    	JB	short gl_2	; Already upper case, go check type
 34436 000059FF 3C7A                    	CMP	AL,"z"
 34437 00005A01 7702                    	JA	short gl_1
 34438 00005A03 2C20                    	SUB	AL,20H		; Convert to upper case
 34439                                  
 34440                                  ; Map European character to upper case
 34441                                  
 34442                                  gl_1:
 34443 00005A05 3C80                    	CMP	AL,80H
 34444 00005A07 720A                    	JB	short gl_2	; Not EuroChar, go check type
 34445 00005A09 2C80                    	SUB	AL,80H		; translate to upper case with this index
 34446                                  
 34447                                  	; M048 - Start 
 34448                                  	; Lantastic call Ucase thru int 2f without setting SS to DOSDATA.
 34449                                  	; So we shall set up DS and to access FILE_UCASE_TAB in BX and also 
 34450                                  	; preserve it.
 34451                                  
 34452                                  	; 09/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 34453                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34454                                  	;;XLAT	BYTE [CS:BX]	; ds as file_ucase_tab is in DOSDATA
 34455                                  	;CS	XLAT
 34456                                  
 34457                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34458                                  
 34459                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34460 00005A0B 1E                      	push	ds
 34461                                  	;getdseg <ds>
 34462 00005A0C 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 34463 00005A11 D7                      	XLAT			; ds as file_ucase_tab is in DOSDATA
 34464 00005A12 1F                      	pop	ds
 34465                                  
 34466                                  	; M048 - End
 34467                                  
 34468                                  ; Now check the type
 34469                                  
 34470                                  ;If TableLook
 34471                                  gl_2:
 34472                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34473 00005A13 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34474                                  
 34475                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34476                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34477                                  	;; 09/08/2018
 34478                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34479                                  	;cs	xlat	
 34480                                  	
 34481                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34482 00005A14 E81800                  	CALL	GetCharType	; returns type flags in AL
 34483                                  	
 34484                                  	;test	al,1	
 34485 00005A17 A801                    	TEST	AL,FCHK 	; test for normal character
 34486 00005A19 58                      	POP	AX
 34487                                  
 34488 00005A1A 5B                      	POP	BX
 34489 00005A1B C3                      	RETN
 34490                                  
 34491                                  ; This entry has character in AL and lookup table in BX
 34492                                  
 34493                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34494                                  ;	;entry GetLet3
 34495                                  GETLET3: ; 10/08/2018
 34496 00005A1C 53                      	PUSH	BX
 34497 00005A1D EBDC                    	JMP	short gl_0
 34498                                  ;ELSE
 34499                                  ;
 34500                                  ;gl_2:
 34501                                  ;	POP	BX
 34502                                  ;	CMP	AL,"."
 34503                                  ;	retz
 34504                                  ;	CMP	AL,'"'
 34505                                  ;	retz
 34506                                  ;	CALL	PATHCHRCMP
 34507                                  ;	retz
 34508                                  ;	CMP	AL,"["
 34509                                  ;	retz
 34510                                  ;	CMP	AL,"]"
 34511                                  ;	retz
 34512                                  ;ENDIF
 34513                                  
 34514                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
 34515                                  ;
 34516                                  ; DELIM - check if character is a delimiter
 34517                                  ;	Entry : AX = character to check
 34518                                  ;	Exit  : ZF set if character is not a delimiter
 34519                                  ;	Uses  : Flags
 34520                                  ;
 34521                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
 34522                                  
 34523                                  	;entry	DELIM
 34524                                  DELIM:
 34525                                  ;IF TableLook
 34526                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34527 00005A1F 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34528                                  
 34529                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34530                                  	;push	bx
 34531                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34532                                  	;;09/08/2018
 34533                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34534                                  	;cs	xlat
 34535                                  	;pop	bx
 34536                                  
 34537                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34538 00005A20 E80C00                  	CALL	GetCharType
 34539                                  	
 34540                                  	;test	al,2
 34541 00005A23 A802                    	TEST	AL,FDELIM
 34542 00005A25 58                      	POP	AX
 34543 00005A26 C3                      	RETN
 34544                                  ;ELSE
 34545                                  ;	CMP	AL,":"
 34546                                  ;	retz
 34547                                  ;
 34548                                  ;	CMP	AL,"<"
 34549                                  ;	retz
 34550                                  ;	CMP	AL,"|"
 34551                                  ;	retz
 34552                                  ;	CMP	AL,">"
 34553                                  ;	retz
 34554                                  ;
 34555                                  ;	CMP	AL,"+"
 34556                                  ;	retz
 34557                                  ;	CMP	AL,"="
 34558                                  ;	retz
 34559                                  ;	CMP	AL,";"
 34560                                  ;	retz
 34561                                  ;	CMP	AL,","
 34562                                  ;	retz
 34563                                  ;ENDIF
 34564                                  
 34565                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34566                                  ;
 34567                                  ;  SPCHK - checks to see if a character is a space or equivalent
 34568                                  ;	Entry : AL = character to check
 34569                                  ;	Exit  : ZF set if character is a space
 34570                                  ;	Uses  : flags
 34571                                  ;
 34572                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34573                                  
 34574                                  	;entry SPCHK
 34575                                  SPCHK:
 34576                                  ;IF TableLook
 34577                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34578 00005A27 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34579                                  
 34580                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34581                                  	;push	bx
 34582                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34583                                  	;; 09/08/2018
 34584                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34585                                  	;cs	xlat
 34586                                  	;pop	bx
 34587                                  
 34588                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34589 00005A28 E80400                  	CALL	GetCharType
 34590                                  	
 34591                                  	;test	al,4
 34592 00005A2B A804                    	TEST	AL,FSPCHK
 34593 00005A2D 58                      	POP	AX
 34594 00005A2E C3                      	RETN
 34595                                  ;ELSE
 34596                                  ;	CMP	AL,9		; Filter out tabs too
 34597                                  ;	retz
 34598                                  ;; WARNING! " " MUST be the last compare
 34599                                  ;	CMP	AL," "
 34600                                  ;	return
 34601                                  ;ENDIF
 34602                                  
 34603                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34604                                  ;
 34605                                  ;  GetCharType - return flag bits indicating character type
 34606                                  ;	Bits are defined in DOSSYM.INC. Uses lookup table
 34607                                  ;	defined above at label CharType.
 34608                                  ;
 34609                                  ;	Entry : AL = character to return type flags for
 34610                                  ;	Exit  : AL = type flags
 34611                                  ;	Uses  : AL, flags
 34612                                  ;
 34613                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34614                                  
 34615                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34616                                  
 34617                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34618                                  
 34619                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34620                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34621                                  
 34622                                  GetCharType:
 34623                                  	;cmp	al,7Eh
 34624 00005A2F 3C7E                    	cmp	al,CharType_last 	; beyond end of table?
 34625 00005A31 7314                    	jae	short gct_90		; return standard value
 34626                                  
 34627 00005A33 53                      	push	bx
 34628 00005A34 BB[B759]                	mov	bx,CharType		; load lookup table
 34629 00005A37 D0E8                    	shr	al,1			; adjust for half-byte table entry size
 34630                                  	;xlat	cs:[bx] 		; get flags
 34631 00005A39 2ED7                    	cs	xlat	
 34632 00005A3B 5B                      	pop	bx
 34633                                  
 34634                                  ; carry clear from previous shift means we want the low nibble.  Otherwise
 34635                                  ; we have to shift the flags down to the low nibble
 34636                                  
 34637 00005A3C 7306                    	jnc	short gct_80		; carry clear, no shift needed
 34638                                  
 34639                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34640                                  %if 0
 34641                                  	shr	al,1			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 34642                                  	shr	al,1
 34643                                  	shr	al,1
 34644                                  	shr	al,1
 34645                                  %else
 34646                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34647                                  	;;;
 34648 00005A3E 51                      	push	cx
 34649 00005A3F B104                    	mov	cl,4			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 34650 00005A41 D2E8                    	shr	al,cl
 34651 00005A43 59                      	pop	cx
 34652                                  	;;;
 34653                                  %endif
 34654                                  
 34655                                  gct_80:
 34656 00005A44 240F                    	and	al,0Fh			; clear the unused nibble
 34657 00005A46 C3                      	retn
 34658                                  gct_90:
 34659 00005A47 B00F                    	mov	al,0Fh			; set all flags
 34660 00005A49 C3                      	retn
 34661                                  
 34662                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34663                                  ;
 34664                                  ; Procedure : PATHCHRCMP
 34665                                  ;
 34666                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34667                                  
 34668                                  PATHCHRCMP:
 34669 00005A4A 3C2F                    	CMP	AL,'/'
 34670 00005A4C 7606                    	JBE	short PathRet
 34671 00005A4E 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 34672 00005A50 C3                      	retn
 34673                                  GotFor:
 34674 00005A51 B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 34675 00005A53 C3                      	retn
 34676                                  PathRet:
 34677 00005A54 74FB                    	JZ	short GotFor
 34678 00005A56 C3                      	retn

 34683                                  ; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 34684                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34685                                  ; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34686                                  
 34687                                  ; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11, CTRLC.ASM, 1983)
 34688                                  
 34689                                  ;**	MSCTRLC.ASM - ^C and error handler for MSDOS
 34690                                  
 34691                                  ;	TITLE	Control C detection, Hard error and EXIT routines
 34692                                  ;	NAME	IBMCTRLC
 34693                                  
 34694                                  ;**	Low level routines for detecting special characters on CON input,
 34695                                  ;	the ^C exit/int code, the Hard error INT 24 code, the
 34696                                  ;	process termination code, and the INT 0 divide overflow handler.
 34697                                  ;
 34698                                  ;	FATAL
 34699                                  ;	FATAL1
 34700                                  ;	reset_environment
 34701                                  ;	DSKSTATCHK
 34702                                  ;	SPOOLINT
 34703                                  ;	STATCHK
 34704                                  ;	CNTCHAND
 34705                                  ;	DIVOV
 34706                                  ;	CHARHARD
 34707                                  ;	HardErr
 34708                                  ;
 34709                                  ;	Revision history:
 34710                                  ;
 34711                                  ;	    AN000	version 4.0   Jan 1988
 34712                                  ;	    A002	PTM    -- dir >lpt3 hangs
 34713                                  ;	    A003	PTM 3957- fake version for IBMCAHE.COM
 34714                                  ;
 34715                                  ; 	M011: NEC's 8086 clone chip uses Intel's undocumented bit number in
 34716                                  ;	      flags register. In order to return to user normally DOS used to
 34717                                  ;	      move F202 into flags, which sets bit number 1 in flags uncondit-
 34718                                  ;	      ionally. Now it is modified to maintain the state of bit 1.
 34719                                  ;
 34720                                  ; 	M024: suppressed fail and ignore options if not in the middle of int 
 34721                                  ;	      24 and if Ctrl P or ctrl printscrn is pressed in routine 
 34722                                  ;	      charhard.
 34723                                  
 34724                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34725                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34726                                  ;		public	LowInt23Addr

 35029                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35030                                  ;
 35031                                  ; Procedure Name : CNTHAND ( CTRLC_C HANDLER )
 35032                                  ;
 35033                                  ; "^C" and CR/LF is printed. Then the user registers are restored and the
 35034                                  ; user CTRL-C handler is executed. At this point the top of the stack has 1)
 35035                                  ; the interrupt return address should the user CTRL-C handler wish to allow
 35036                                  ; processing to continue; 2) the original interrupt return address to the code
 35037                                  ; that performed the function call in the first place. If the user CTRL-C
 35038                                  ; handler wishes to continue, it must leave all registers unchanged and RET
 35039                                  ; (not IRET) with carry CLEAR. If carry is SET then an terminate system call
 35040                                  ; is simulated.
 35041                                  ;
 35042                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35043                                  
 35044                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 35045                                  
 35046                                  CNTCHAND:
 35047                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; SS override
 35048                                  					; AN002; from RAWOUT
 35049                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DOS34_FLAG],CTRL_BREAK_FLAG  
 35050                                  	;JNZ	short around_deadlock 	; AN002;
 35051                                  
 35052                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35053                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS DOSCODE:91C4h, 29/12/2022)
 35054 00005B9F 36F606[1206]02          	TEST	byte [SS:DOS34_FLAG+1],(CTRL_BREAK_FLAG>>8)  ; 2 
 35055 00005BA5 7508                    	JNZ	short around_deadlock 	; AN002;
 35056                                  
 35057 00005BA7 B003                            MOV     AL,3			; Display "^C"
 35058 00005BA9 E8CFC0                          CALL	BUFOUT
 35059 00005BAC E864BF                          CALL	CRLF
 35060                                  around_deadlock:
 35061 00005BAF 16                              PUSH    SS
 35062 00005BB0 1F                              POP     DS
 35063 00005BB1 803E[5703]00                    CMP     BYTE [CONSWAP],0
 35064 00005BB6 7403                            JZ      SHORT NOSWAP
 35065 00005BB8 E82DDE                          CALL	SWAPBACK
 35066                                  NOSWAP:
 35067 00005BBB FA                      	CLI				; Prepare to play with stack
 35068 00005BBC 8E16[8605]              	MOV	SS,[USER_SS]		; User stack now restored
 35069 00005BC0 8B26[8405]              	MOV	SP,[USER_SP]
 35070 00005BC4 E88EA8                          CALL	restore_world       ; User registers now restored
 35071                                  
 35072                                  	; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 
 35073                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (IBMDOS.COM - Offset 56ACh)
 35074                                          ; 14/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 35075                                  	;MOV	BYTE [CS:INDOS],0	
 35076                                          ;MOV	BYTE [CS:ERRORMODE],0
 35077                                          ;MOV	[CS:ConC_Spsave],SP
 35078                                  	;clc	;30/07/2018
 35079                                          ;INT	int_ctrl_c ; 23h    ; Execute user Ctrl-C handler
 35080                                  	;;int	23h	; DOS - CONTROL "C" EXIT ADDRESS
 35081                                  			; Return: return via RETF 2 with CF set
 35082                                  			; DOS will abort program with errorlevel 0
 35083                                  			; else
 35084                                  			; interrupted DOS call continues
 35085                                  
 35086                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35087                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS,91ECh) 
 35088                                  
 35089                                  	; CS was used to address these variables. We have to use DOSDATA
 35090                                  	
 35091 00005BC7 07                      	pop	es ; *	; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS.SYS, DOSCODE:91ECh)
 35092                                  			; (pop es, after 'call restore_world')	
 35093 00005BC8 1E                      	push	ds
 35094                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds -> dosdata
 35095 00005BC9 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 35096 00005BCE C606[2103]00            	mov	byte [INDOS],0		; Go to known state
 35097                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35098                                  	;;;
 35099 00005BD3 C606[C011]00            	mov	byte [INDOS_FLAG],0	; 2nd 'in dos' flag (what for?)
 35100                                  	;;;
 35101 00005BD8 C606[2003]00            	mov	byte [ERRORMODE],0
 35102 00005BDD 8926[3203]              	mov	[ConC_Spsave],SP	; save his SP
 35103                                  	; User SP has changed because of push. Adjust for it
 35104 00005BE1 8306[3203]02            	add	word [ConC_Spsave],2
 35105                                  
 35106 00005BE6 803E[660D]00            	cmp	byte [DosHasHMA],0	; Q: is dos running in HMA (M021)
 35107 00005BEB 1F                       	pop	ds	; restore ds
 35108 00005BEC 7505                    	jne	short do_low_int23	; Y: the int must be done from low mem
 35109 00005BEE F8                      	CLC				
 35110 00005BEF CD23                    	INT	int_ctrl_c  ; int 23h	; N: Execute user Ctrl-C handler
 35111 00005BF1 EB06                    	jmp	short ctrlc_ret_addr
 35112                                  
 35113                                  	; 05/05/2019
 35114                                  do_low_int23:
 35115 00005BF3 F8                      	clc
 35116 00005BF4 2EFF1E[575A]            	call	far [cs:LowInt23Addr]
 35117                                  
 35118                                  	; 30/07/2018 
 35119                                  
 35120                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (IBMDOS.COM - Offset 56C0h)
 35121                                  
 35122                                  ; The user has returned to us. The circumstances we allow are:
 35123                                  ;
 35124                                  ;   IRET	We retry the operation by redispatching the system call
 35125                                  ;   CLC/RETF	POP the stack and retry
 35126                                  ;   ... 	Exit the current process with ^C exit
 35127                                  ;
 35128                                  ; User's may RETURN to us and leave interrupts on. 
 35129                                  ; Turn 'em off just to be sure
 35130                                  
 35131                                  ctrlc_ret_addr: ; 05/05/2019
 35132                                  
 35133 00005BF9 FA                      	CLI
 35134                                  
 35135                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 
 35136                                  	;MOV	[CS:USER_IN_AX],ax	; save the AX
 35137                                  	;PUSHF				; and the flags (maybe new call)
 35138                                  	;POP	AX
 35139                                  
 35140                                  	; 05/05/2019
 35141                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35142                                  
 35143                                  	; We have to use DOSDATA for these variables. Previously CS was used 
 35144                                  
 35145 00005BFA 50                      	push	ax
 35146 00005BFB 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 35147                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds -> dosdata
 35148 00005BFD 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 35149 00005C02 A3[630D]                	mov	[TEMPSEG],ax
 35150 00005C05 58                      	pop	ax
 35151 00005C06 A3[3A03]                	MOV	[USER_IN_AX],ax		; save the AX
 35152 00005C09 9C                      	pushf				; and the flags (maybe new call)
 35153 00005C0A 58                      	pop	ax
 35154                                  
 35155                                  ; See if the input stack is identical to the output stack
 35156                                  
 35157                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 35158                                  	;CMP	SP,[CS:ConC_Spsave]
 35159                                  	;JNZ	SHORT ctrlc_try_new	; current SP not the same as saved SP
 35160                                  
 35161                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35162 00005C0B 3B26[3203]              	CMP	SP,[ConC_Spsave]
 35163 00005C0F 750A                    	JNZ	SHORT ctrlc_try_new	; current SP not the same as saved SP
 35164                                  
 35165                                  ; Repeat the operation by redispatching the system call.
 35166                                  
 35167                                  ctrlc_repeat:
 35168                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 35169                                  	;MOV	AX,[CS:USER_IN_AX]
 35170                                  	; 05/05/2019
 35171                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35172 00005C11 A1[3A03]                	mov	ax,[USER_IN_AX]
 35173 00005C14 8E1E[630D]              	mov	ds,[TEMPSEG]		; restore ds and original sp
 35174                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0 
 35175                                  	;transfer COMMAND
 35176                                  COMMANDJ:
 35177 00005C18 E9EAA6                  	JMP	COMMAND
 35178                                  
 35179                                  ; The current SP is NOT the same as the input SP. Presume that he 
 35180                                  ; RETF'd leaving some flags on the stack and examine the input
 35181                                  
 35182                                  ctrlc_try_new:
 35183                                  	; 29/02/2024
 35184                                  	;ADD	SP,2			; pop those flags
 35185                                  	;
 35186                                  	;;test	ax,1
 35187                                  	;TEST	AX,f_Carry		; did he return with carry?
 35188 00005C1B A801                    	test	al,f_Carry ; test al,1
 35189                                  	;
 35190                                  	; 29/02/2024
 35191 00005C1D 58                      	pop	ax  ;  (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35192                                  	;
 35193 00005C1E 74F1                    	JZ	short ctrlc_repeat	; no carry set, just retry
 35194                                  
 35195                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35196 00005C20 8E1E[630D]              	mov	ds,[TEMPSEG]		; restore ds
 35197

 35395                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35396                                  ;
 35397                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErr
 35398                                  ;
 35399                                  ; Hard disk error handler. Entry conditions:
 35400                                  ;	DS:BX = Original disk transfer address
 35401                                  ;	DX = Original logical sector number
 35402                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors to go (first one gave the error)
 35403                                  ;	AX = Hardware error code
 35404                                  ;	DI = Original sector transfer count	
 35405                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 35406                                  ;	[READOP] = 0 for read, 1 for write
 35407                                  ;	Allowed Set with allowed responses to this error (other bits MUST BE 0)
 35408                                  ; Output:
 35409                                  ;	[FAILERR] will be set if user responded FAIL
 35410                                  ;
 35411                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35412                                  
 35413                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 35414                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35415                                  HARDERR:
 35416                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35417                                  	; 30/07/2018
 35418                                  	; 08/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 35419 00005CB4 97                      	XCHG	AX,DI		  	; Error code in DI, count in AX
 35420                                  	;and	di,0FFh
 35421 00005CB5 81E7FF00                	AND	DI,STECODE		; And off status bits
 35422                                  	;CMP	DI,WRECODE		; Write Protect Error?
 35423                                  	;cmp	di,0
 35424 00005CB9 83FF00                  	cmp	DI,error_I24_write_protect ; Write Protect Error?
 35425 00005CBC 750A                    	JNZ	short NOSETWRPERR
 35426 00005CBE 50                      	PUSH	AX
 35427                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 35428                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 35429                                  	;;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+0]
 35430                                  	; 15/12/2022

 35432                                  		; 15/03/2018
 35433 00005CC3 36A2[2203]              	MOV	[SS:WPERR],AL		; Flag drive with WP error
 35434 00005CC7 58                      	POP	AX
 35435                                  NOSETWRPERR:
 35436 00005CC8 29C8                    	SUB	AX,CX		  ; Number of sectors successfully transferred
 35437 00005CCA 01C2                    	ADD	DX,AX		  ; First sector number to retry
 35438                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35439                                  	;;;

 35448                                  	;XOR	AH,AH ; *	  	; Flag disk section in error

 35450                                  	;;;

 35452                                  	;cmp	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR],0

 35454 00005CE1 7506                    	jnz	short TESTDIR
 35455                                  	;;;
 35456                                  	;CMP	DX,[ES:BP+6] 		; In reserved area?
 35457 00005CE3 263B5606                	CMP	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FIRST_FAT]
 35458 00005CE7 7246                    	JB	SHORT ERRINT
 35459                                  
 35460                                  TESTDIR:	; 29/02/2024	
 35461 00005CE9 FEC4                    	INC	AH			; Flag for FAT
 35462                                  
 35463                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35464                                  	;;;

 35466 00005CEB 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0
 35467 00005CF0 7525                    	jnz	short TESTDIR3 ; not FAT32
 35468 00005CF2 52                      	push	dx
 35469 00005CF3 368B16[0706]            	mov	dx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 35470                                  	;cmp	dx,[es:bp+2Bh]
 35471 00005CF8 263B562B                	cmp	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FCLUS_FSECTOR+2]
 35472 00005CFC 5A                      	pop	dx
 35473 00005CFD 7504                    	jnz	short TESTDIR1	; Err in FAT must force recomp of freespace
 35474                                  	;cmp	dx,[es:bp+29h]
 35475 00005CFF 263B5629                	cmp	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FCLUS_FSECTOR]
 35476                                  TESTDIR1:

 35478                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Fh],0FFFFh ; -1
 35479 00005D05 26C7461FFFFF            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],0FFFFh
 35480                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+21h],0FFFFh ; -1
 35481 00005D0B 26C74621FFFF            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2],0FFFFh

 35490                                  	;;;
 35491

 35530                                  	; 15/03/2018

 35537                                  
 35538                                  	; DI has the INT-24-style extended error. We now map the error code
 35539                                  	; for this into the normalized get extended error set by using the

 35542                                  	; table alone.

 35548 00005D52 83FF0C                  	CMP	DI,error_I24_gen_failure
 35549 00005D55 7603                    	JBE	short GOT_RIGHT_CODE	; Error codes above gen_failure get
 35550 00005D57 BF0C00                  	MOV	DI,error_I24_gen_failure; mapped to gen_failure. Real codes
 35551                                  					;  Only come via GetExtendedError

 35553                                  ;** ----------------------------------------------------------------
 35554                                  ;
 35555                                  ; Entry point used by REDIRector on Network I 24 errors.
 35556                                  ;
 35557                                  ;	ASSUME	DS:NOTHING,ES:NOTHING,SS:DOSDATA
 35558                                  ;
 35559                                  ; ALL I 24 regs set up. ALL Extended error info SET. ALLOWED Set.
 35560                                  ;	EXITHOLD set for restore of ES:BP.
 35561                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------------------
 35562                                  	;entry	NET_I24_ENTRY
 35563                                  NET_I24_ENTRY:
 35564                                  GOT_RIGHT_CODE:
 35565 00005D5A 36803E[2003]00          	CMP	BYTE [SS:ERRORMODE],0	; No INT 24s if already INT 24
 35566 00005D60 7404                    	JZ	SHORT NoSetFail
 35567 00005D62 B003                    	MOV	AL,3
 35568 00005D64 EB74                    	JMP	short FailRet
 35569                                  NoSetFail:

 35571 00005D6B 16                      	PUSH	SS
 35572 00005D6C 07                      	POP	ES
 35573                                      
 35574                                  	; Wango!!! We may need to free some user state info... In 
 35575                                  	; particular, we may have locked down a JFN for a user and he may
 35576                                  	; NEVER return to us. Thus,we need to free it here and then
 35577                                  	; reallocate it when we come back.
 35578                                  
 35579 00005D6D 36833E[AA05]FF          	CMP	word [SS:SFN],-1 ; 0FFFFh
 35580 00005D73 740C                    	JZ	short _NoFree
 35581 00005D75 1E                      	push	ds

 35586 00005D80 1F                      	pop	ds

 35590                                  					; Prepare to play with stack
 35591 00005D82 36FE06[2003]            	INC	BYTE [SS:ERRORMODE]	; Flag INT 24 in progress

 35593

 35595                                  	;;;

 35597                                  	;;;
 35598

 35600

 35605 00005D97 7404                    	JZ	short i24yes		; AN000;IFS.no
 35606                                  faili24:				; AN000;
 35607 00005D99 B003                    	MOV	AL,3			; AN000;IFS.fake fail
 35608 00005D9B EB27                    	JMP	short passi24 		; AN000;IFS.exit
 35609                                  i24yes: 				; AN000;
 35610                                  	;; Extended Open hooks
 35611                                  
 35612 00005D9D 368E16[8605]            	MOV	SS,[SS:USER_SS]
 35613 00005DA2 268B26[8405]            	MOV	SP,[ES:USER_SP]	; User stack pointer restored
 35614

 35617                                  					; must preserve ES

 35626                                  	; 05/05/2019

 35640                                  
 35641                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35642                                  	;;;

 35644                                  	;;;
 35645                                  
 35646 00005DD3 36C606[2003]00          	MOV	BYTE [SS:ERRORMODE],0	; Back from INT 24
 35647 00005DD9 FB                      	STI
 35648                                  FailRet:
 35649 00005DDA 36C42E[8005]            	LES	BP,[SS:EXITHOLD]
 35650                                  	
 35651                                  	; 08/07/2018
 35652                                  
 35653                                  	; Triage the user's reply.
 35654                                  
 35655 00005DDF 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1
 35656 00005DE1 723D                    	JB	short CheckIgnore	; 0 => ignore
 35657 00005DE3 7445                    	JZ	short CheckRetry	; 1 => retry

 35659 00005DE7 7549                    	JNZ	short DoAbort 		; 2, invalid => abort

 35663                                  					; SS override for ALLOWED, EXTOPEN_ON,
 35664                                  					; ALLOWED, FAILERR, WPERR, SFN, pJFN

 35677                                  CleanUp:

 35679 00005E06 36833E[AA05]FF          	CMP	word [SS:SFN],-1
 35680                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 35681                                  	;jnz	short CleanUp2
 35682                                  	;retn
 35683                                  	; 17/12/2022
 35684 00005E0C 7411                    	jz	short Cleanup_retn ; 08/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 35685                                  CleanUp2:
 35686 00005E0E 1E                      	push	ds
 35687 00005E0F 56                      	push	si
 35688 00005E10 50                      	push	ax
 35689 00005E11 36A1[AA05]              	MOV	AX,[ss:SFN]
